text: This little gem squeezed in between shopping stores in Gilbert is heavenly. The flavors are endless and I I love how they allow you to taste test the gelatos. My favorite is the sea salt caramel also the cinnamon apple pie. Even with this cool weather out there, I still crave a scoop of Frost. I wish they had a location in Mesa.

Amazing flavors and the employees are very friendly. They will give you free samples of everything. You have to wait in line for awhile but it's worth it. The salted Carmel is very good. They have chocolate flavors, fruit flavors, smoothies, coffee mixes, and pints of ice cream you can buy.

Seriously the best ice cream/gelato I have ever had. I like ice cream, frozen yogurt, gelato A LOT. I have tried a ton of places but Frost is the most amazing frozen treat I have ever had. I would give 10 stars if I could. Not to mention the staff is SUPER FRIENDLY and extremely knowledgable. You can try as many samples as you want - and I have. Oh and its low calorie!!! Wahoo! I frequent Brio next door often for date night, but never get their deserts any more - we always head to Frost.

So I just held a contest in my head for my favorite dessert. It was a tough choice between St. Francis' Cheesecake in a Jar, Frost's gelato, and Province's Apple-Almond Wafer Stack. After an intense talent and speech competition, the gelato from Frost was declared the winner!  I've been to the store in Gilbert a handful of times. I'm always impressed that the service does not flounder when the line increases. What is the hurry when you're about to enjoy something wonderful? My personal faves are the mango sorbet, strawberry yogurt, and chocolate hazelnut crunch.   I took a few different flavors to be the dessert for a family dinner recently, and it was the talk of the meal! My mother is quite picky with desserts, but she gushed over the blackberry cabernet.  The employees are always friendly and engaging. The store has a shimmer about it,  like it has been freshly waxed and buffed by elves the night before. They allowed me to try several flavors before I made my decision. There is no "omg this is going straight to my waist/hips" anxiety like there is with ice cream. Frost's gelato is lighter and healthier without sacrificing on taste. It has flavor for days! I wish I could say that I knew Frost before it was cool, but it's too late, it already is.
This place is awesome. It is a weekly visit for the spousal unit and myself. She gets a gelato and I have a shot of espresso.

I went with my friend to Frost last night. I've been to several gelato places before and I went to Italy a couple years ago and treated myself to gelato every day... so it's easy to say I'm a fan of gelato.  When we walked in, we were greeted right away. The super friendly gelato girl gave us the run down of questions: have we been to frost before, have we had gelato before, the perks of gelato over ice cream and getting samples is recommended.   They have more of a selection of flavors than any gelato store I've been to. Each flavor is decorated to make them even more appetizing. The gelato girl gave great recommendations and we settled on the tiramisu and salted caramel. They were both amazing.   The price is a little steep but for a treat once in a while, it is totally worth it. Also, with gelato a little goes a long way. That is why they give you the baby spoons with your cup.   The decor is very modern and the shop looks spotless. The owner put a lot of time and work into their shop and it shows. They even come about with cups of water to their customers. This was a nice little touch to show they care.  I will certainly be back with my boyfriend soon. It's a great location just outside the main strip of the mall.

O M G. Can you say heaven?? This was our first time here and boyyyyy was it yummy. I mixed the dark chocolate and peanut butter crunch which was delicious but I probably sampled about 20 different flavors and all are phenomenal. I think next time I might mix the dark chocolate with coconut or banana mmm. Definitely a good gelato spot!

Good morning I am a customer from day one ..and everyone in your store that you have  hired, you've done a great job with the customer service that they provide.  I had a birthday dinner for my son last evening at Brio, walked over to your store to pick up my call In. Not sure, who took the order and hour before. But there's one particular person that stood out as I walked in to pick up my  call-in and her realizing that it wasn't there. She went over the call of duty to make me happy... I do spend a lot of money in your store... she didn't  know that and it really didn't matter..she just wanted to make sure that the customer in front of her was taken care of immediately . Of  what  they deserve.  Just want to make sure I get her name right and she's recognized for this great customer service that she provided.  I did ask somebody at the register what her name was. ... I think it was  ?Melissa. I hope I'm getting the name right ..  she needs to be recognized, and  for you, hiring the right person for your store. Great job!!!!?? Thank you Jan D  Gilbert resident

Outstanding Gelato place!  We really enjoy it and find it as authentic and delicious as the gelato we first tasted & experienced in some of the wonderful Gelateria's of Italy. Love all their different flavors of Sorbet, too. Great staff & clean location. My favorites are the Espresso, Chai tea, Cardamom & Coconut in the gelato flavors. Limoncello, Tangelo, Passion fruit & Blackberry in the sorbets. Yum!

One of the best customer service experiences I have ever had.  I was greeted by a young man in High School (Drew), this kid was the most personable engaging dudes I have met in a while.  The gelato was awesome and the price was great!  I got a large three flavored gelato for under $6. This place is legit they even offered to pack my to go bag with ice for the ride home!

If you are in the area, you need to go to eat this gelato! They have a million different choices; all made by them. No matter what you get it will be delicious. Hands down the best frozen dessert we have eaten.

We use to live VERY close, and loved and endured the longer lines.  Longer lines because Yum!  So worth it.  We don't get there as often but top on our lists when we want a treat.  We'll drive because it's worth it.  So many flavors and so fresh tasting.  You won't want the dark chocolate  (ok you will but hoping to dissuade so it won't be all gone when I go)

My first review was 4 stars NOW 1. The owner had my review removed citing I violated content guidelines. I find that a gutless move to address a concern I had as a customer. Let me see if Yelp removes this one.  I recognize that they are getting five-star reviews for a product that is fantastic. They will NOT get that from me because of two experiences I've had in their shop.   Yes they have really good gelato, dare I say amazing? But the owner (not an employee) needs better customer service skills. The owner yelled at one of my kids for touching the glass when pointing at the flavor they wanted. She had just had an employee clean the display. Sorry, ma'am it's an ice cream shop and your displays are at knee level for adults, eye level for kids. Get over it.   I removed the other part of my review which directly spoke about an employee.   What floors me is rather than the owner using Yelp to talk to me as a customer, they defensively had my review removed. If this one disappears, I will assume it's because FROST is a paid Yelp advertiser and they will bend over backwards for businesses that give them money.

Great customer service, delicious and unique. This place is amazing , not only is it the best quality gelato EVER, but they are clean, friendly and reasonable.  I had family come visit from California,  and being that we are regulars we wanted our family to try their deliciousness.  Well , it was close to their closing time, and 5 min before they closed , I called them and asked if they'd let us in a little past closing. Amazingly they waited about 5 min for us and our family got to try their Gelato.  They loved it and were very impressed with their service.  The owner is very humble and customer service oriented.

Bar none - BGE! Best Gelato Ever. A flavor for any palette. Try the blended drink. A bit more labor, but clearly a labor of love and worth the wait: especially if your hands are tied spooning gelato into your kids' mouths. Lol.
There really are no words for this, everyone has to try it once and you will always come back! Endless different flavors with a taste that can not be described, only experienced!

Very good gelato, with many flavor options.  They also have sorbet and coffee, although we didn't try them.  The restaurant was clean and inviting.  I've had slightly better gelato in Europe, but I'm not aware of a better dessert in Gilbert.  A bit pricey, but the value is there.  I had a brief vision of opening my own franchise.

I always thought gelato was just gelato until I went to Frost. They have a ton of flavors, its always super busy but the line goes quick and you can try any flavor you want. My favorite is the sea salt caramel. Everyone that works there is very helpful and very nice which is actually rare at some of these types of places especially when there are teenagers working. Everyone is professional and friendly here. And the gelato itself is so good, I crave it. And from what I was told, gelato has less fat than ice cream so that's a bonus ;)

The only downside to this place is that it's almost always busy, but that goes to show that it's one of the best Gelato spots on the east side. Even on the busiest night the staff is always super friendly. They have a ton of flavors to choose from and many are unique.

Every time I go to Frost I leave happy.  Not only do I never feel guilty about the delicious gelato I'm savoring, but every time I've been there they give away surprise freebies!  Last night as my husband and I were sharing our peanut butter crunch gelato at the counter, he said "It smells amazing in here- like fresh waffles".  A minute later the manager came over and handed us a fresh waffle cone.  FOR FREE!  She made our day.  Not only was it delicious but it made the gelato a million times more delicious.  Thank again Frost and Kristin (the manager).  We'll be back soon! :)
We love Frost! The manager at the Gilbert location, Jonathan, suggested the Affogato - espresso poured over scoops of gelato - it was amazing! Frost never disappoints!

The gelato was good, and so was the customer service. The only reason why I'm giving 2 stars is because while an employee (very helpful and kind) was scooping my gelato, I believe she was a manager came over and just interrupted the conversation we were having. I love the taste but the lady with short black hair should be a little kinder to her customers.

Coming from Europe this does not taste like gelato. The texture is off and they keep it way too frozen in their bins. The lady serving had to dig for dark chocolate for few mintutes before she got a scoop... gelato should be creamy and smooth so you should get a scoop easily with a flat spatula (that's how they do it in Italy!) but the flavors are really good. So it's good ice cream but not quite the real italian gelato :) Oh also my scoop of hazelnut had 2 small pieces of foil in it ... not cool!

Frost is by far my favorite dessert place. Every flavor I have ever tried was delicious. Of course I have my favorites like the Sea Salt Caramel and the Bellini! So good! There is usually a line and its usually out the door. It always goes very fast even though the employees behind the counter let you try as many flavors as you want. I love that they pass out cups of water while you are in line or sitting down enjoying your gelato. This place is always clean and well kept. A family favorite and we frequent Frost often.

I was given a gift card to this place and I like the gelato! The thing that truly made our experience though was the gentleman that helped us he was very friendly and let us try anything we wanted to before we decided. Good atmosphere too!

Frost is simply the best dessert choice you can make! My wife and I go here 3 or more times per week! I used to be a die-hard frozen-yogurt fan, but then I experienced the joy that is Frost gelato.   My top flavor choices: chocolate, cookie's and cream, peanut butter crunch! You seriously can't go wrong.

We were in town visiting my fiancé's family and we stopped here. It was so good! Definitely worth 5 stars. I got chocolate and mint chocolate chip but I really wish I would have gotten the sea salt caramel. I tasted it and it was delicious! We had a group of 8 and none of us were disappointed :) we will definitely be back next time!

Best gelato in AZ!!!!!!! There is always a little wait, but the hype and wait for it is true because it is delicious! I have tried the dark chocolate, pistachio, and sea salt gelato all of which have been amazing!!! Plus they let you sample anything and never show frustration about you taking you time to pick and choose through there selection of dessert! Yum!!!

This place always crowded, you need wait by the line.  this Gelato is delicious , though you can choose with many samples as they give, dark chocolate is always my favorite gelato flavors.  you can come and enjoy!!

HOT DIGGITY.... Wait should I say COLD DIGGITY!?! Ha ha ha  I was so excited when I walked in and found a VERY nice staff of Ladies looking to help a Gelato Newb! The ladies let me try MULTIPLE flavors of Gelato AND Sorbet!   Most of the time when you can sample at an establishment you get this vibe after 2 flavors that you need to hurry up... NOT HERE! They want you to be happy with what you purchase... at least thats was the vibe I got!   Whenever I try a new place I always ask "Whats your Favorite or What do you Recommend" & I got some FANTASTIC Recommendations!   My recommendation: Try, Try, Try before you buy!
Best in town! The no sugar added flavors are indulgence without the guilt! They have a great bunch of people working there too (very friendly and extremely helpful).

Amazing. I've been here about 4 times and each time it is heaven. The first time I went there was a crazy long line. We were rushed to pick a flavor and didn't get to sample much. The other times I have been I have been able to try many samples. All of the staff is super friendly and share lots of fun info about the flavors. The gelato is so delicious and creamy.
hands down the best gelato shop in az.  love gelato?  come here and experience the goodness.

I think I've been here 3 times already and just never got around to writing a review.  My wife found this place through Yelp, so we decided to give it a try.  The first time I had sea salt caramel and dark chocolate.  To this day that combo is still my favorite.  The other times I've visited I tried the mango, pineapple, and kiwi sorbets.  I loved all 3 of those as well especially the kiwi.  This is our family's go-to dessert spot whenever we feel like some gelato.  It's about 10 minutes away, so it's not from us at all.
Soo worth the wait when there is one!!!! Well deserved 5 star rating. Been coming here since they opened and have always had great customer service with my delicious gelato

You have to try this place!  Once you do, you will definitely understand why.  They have a hug selection of flavors and some very unique things such as hot chocolate with gelato in it!  It also appears to be locally and family owned and I do whatever I can to support small business and the community.  Thanks Frost!

Will be coming back almost every weekend now! loved it so much! Great family atmosphere,  many yummy flavors to choose from, you can mix and match different flavors to create some unique choices. For example I mixed the peanut butter crunch and the sea salt Carmel, tasted  like a  snickers bar!! Besides the yummy gelato, I really enjoyed the customer service, but the one person who deserves the most attention is the young gentleman named JONATHAN. Pretty sure that was his name, but he was so friendly, so patient, had a smile on his face the whole time.  Let me tell you, he had a lot of patience, because I sampled almost everything! Id give more than 5 stars if I could!
Great ice cream. The young lady coming around offering water was a very nice touch. Need to empty the trash can on the patio.

A gem in the desert!   I came here based on suggestions from the yelp community. I am not easily excited by food, but the coconut, mango, and roasted almond took me by surprise---in a pleasant way, of course.  They are distinctive in flavor, yet very agreeable to my taste bud. The service is outstanding; Kristy and her staffs are welcoming. The color scheme of the interior is cool---a great contrast to the scorching heat outside---and it made me forget that I was in the desert.  This place is definitely worth the trip. The navigation may not be up to date, but the place is located in the northeast corner of Williams Field and Santan, right behind Barnes and Noble.
I had the dark chocolate and raspberry! Amazing!!!! The customer service is top notch here too!

I feel fine giving this place two stars. First, with the 30 minute wait to get to the front of the line, I was expecting the best gelato I've ever had! I was highly disappointed. The sea salt caramel tasted like it had no salt at all. The mint chocolate chip was chalky, and the straciatella was icy. Overall, the flavors I tried were bland. Second, they use very thin packaging, and so the gelato melts quickly. We took ours to go, and I was perfectly content leaving it in the freezer and pretending it didn't exist. Third, I've had a good amount of gelato in my life, and particularly in the last year. I went to Europe and had it in three countries, and frequently stop by the Gelato Spot in Phoenix. The Gelato Spot is substantially better than Frost. I recommend driving to the nearest Gelato Spot and passing Frost by. Sorry.

This place is delicious, clean, cute, nice atmosphere, DELICIOUS, great for dates or a family night. BUT THE BEST PART is the staff. They are so friendly, knowledgeable about the product, they go above and beyond to make your experience a great one!!!!!!! And great music playing!
First time here! I loved it! I just moved from Colorado and when I have people visit me in the future I'm going to bring them here for a treat.
There's always a line out the door but that is a good thing because the gelato is amazing! So many different flavors to pick from.

We love this place!  The entire staff is always friendly, helpful, and attentive.  The gelato - so many choices...My favorite is the seasalt caramel, and my daughters love the bubble gum flavor.  Truly a great place to stop, especially when it is hot outside!  The best around!

If you have over 30 flavors, it is probably smart to have endless samples! So if you have a hard time making up your mind (like I do) this is the place to sample. :-)The staff is always smiling and friendly. Very knowledgeable about the product they are selling. Don't want gelato? Get sorbet instead. Mix and match flavors. The Rum Raisin, Carmello,coconut,  and some new flavor of the month are always my top picks. The flavors are always changing, and there are still quite a few I have not tried (yet). Bring some friends, and leave behind your guilt. This gelato is MUCH healthier than dairy queen or coldstone creamery's desserts.
Best gelato in the East Valley.  I look forward to each visit!  Way better than ice cream,  Our whole family is hooked.

To die for.  Really.  This is by far best gelato I've ever had.  It is DELISH!  And the flavors are awesome!  Most recently, I've had the blackberry cabernet and the spicy chocolate.  Sooo yummy.  The spicy chocolate was perfect - just chocolatey enough with a little kick.  The blackberry cabernet paired with it couldn't have been better.  I'm not a gelato expert, but I have had it before and I generally don't/can't eat a lot of this.  The density on this is perfect and I don't know...it was just like a party in your mount.  ;)  LOL.  The staff is friendly and I can't wait to go back and try some of the other flavors.  I'm pretty sure you won't be disappointed if you give it a try!

New favorite Gelato location.  I drive from Chandler to enjoy this experience.  Excellent selections and awesome customer service.  They even gave my dog a water bowl while we enjoyed our Gelato outside. Perfecto!

It's the best in the US (that I've had). In Florence, Italy there's an astonishingly good place one bridge up from the Ponteveccio and in the Venice train station there's also a great place too. However, like I said it's the best in the States.
Every single flavor I've tried is delicious! The product is worth the line!

Heaven in a cup with a little spoon! Amazingly delicious! The employees are great - so sweet and friendly and they never make you feel like you're in a rush even with a line out the door. They're gelato is made daily and is seriously the best gelato/ice cream I've ever had. They have a GREAT selection of flavors, so there is something for everyone. .Seriously love it here - and probably visit WAY too often (but trust me, it's worth it!)
Amazing!! Can't get enough of Frost. It is always hard to decide on which flavor combination to get. Any choice you make you won't be disappointed.

I gave it 5 stars but it's a perfect 10! I have ignored this place since it opened although I am at Brio next door weekly. A co-worker gave me a gift certificate so went there after dinner and skipped Brio's rich desserts. Fell in love with the place after the first sample. The young staff is VERY patient and indulged me with all the samples I wanted. I now go every Saturday and get enough to take home for the week. I'm on a diet so I ration it out - it's my one indulgence but half the calories of ice cream.   On Saturday night there was a line out the door. The place is small so it gets a bit crowded but worth it!

Some of the best dessert I've had. I think this is the only place in town that can try to compete with Churn in Phoenix. Customer service is awesome along with every flavor I've had. Lines a re usually long but worth the wait. Keep it up Frost!

I love this place with all my heart. It's so delicious I can barely stand it. Not only is the shop cool, the service amazing, and the gelato not super calorie-laden; but the gelato here is just fantastic. And, if you come on your birthday, you get a free "piccolo" icecream.

Wow!  I have not been to a gelato shoppe as excellent as Frost. The range of interesting flavors with the classics is impressive. Plus the presentation is beautiful. And you can sample it all. Big samples too!    The service is impeccable. Super friendly. One of the ladies stopped cleaning to talk to me and my husband for 15 minutes about the products and the business. You can tell everyone enjoys working there. She even remembered what we both were eating 20 minutes after ordering. She was extremely knowledgable.   I WiLL be back

Yummy gelato!! Friendly staff!! Open late!! What's not to love? Toasted Marshmallow and Chocolate is just like a S'more. Chocolates are all rich and creamy, but Panne cotta, Creme brulee, and Vanilla bean are my faves. Love Frost! Tip- call ahead for the mini-gelato tree (24 different flavors).

We tried FROST fir the fist time on Friday. It is hard to figure out what you want when the line is right in front of the case, but the staff is friendly and willing to give samples to help you decide. I sampled the sea salt caramel and thought it was too sweet fir my liking. We got the pineapple sorbet, and it was fantastic! We went back the next day, and git a large cupwith three flavors: bubblegum, banana, and mint chocolate chip. The bubblegum is just what you'd expect, my 3 yr old lived it! Banana was fantastic, as well as the mint chocolate chip. I can't wait to go back and try the strawberry sorbet and orange sorbet!
Lines are usually a bit long but the service is always great! The salted caramel gelato is delish (it's a must try!)
BEST GELATO IN ARIZONA! They have so many good flavors and the quality is great! They even have a couple of dietetic flavors which are very tasty as well.   Give it a try, you won't be sorry!
From the amazing service super friendly the staff knows the product and is proud to serve it.  Absolutely Deelish
Best gelato ever! I'm not sure what I enjoyed more the gelato or the awesome employees. Made lots of yummy suggestions and let us try any flavor we wanted. We'll be going here again soon!

My cousin took me here for my first time when I was visiting from Georgia. I have to say this way the BEST gelato I have ever had. The staff is very friendly about you trying as many flavors as you would like and they are very knowledgable of their products. I was even told that for the toasted marshmallow gelato that they toast a bunch of giant marshmallows to make it! My cousin had the toasted marshmallow and I had the coconut..of course we shared with each other and loved both equally.   I loved every sample I was given and it was very hard to make a choice. Awesome staff and even better gelatos!
Amazing!  Super friendly and they literally let me try 10 flavors.  Service was great too, they bring you water and are super friendly!  Check it out

Best ever.  Salted carmel and toasted almond are my favorites.  What the store tells me 50% less fat than regular ice cream and 80% less calories than ice cream.  I'll check on that later, but for now I'm addicted to this gelato.  Their receipt and products are imported from Italy.  It's worth it to try just one scoop and then your hooked.

Exquisite taste. Not too much sugar content and a variety of flavors to choose from (I chose coconut and mint, my boyfriend chose toasted coconut and black cherry). It is in a busy plaza and it tends to be crowded. Customer service is exceptional.

We love this place. My family all loves the gelato and I love the sorbet. The flavors are delicious, which I can say from sampling each one, and the atmosphere is so inviting. The employees are so friendly and helpful. It is a hot spot but they bring out samples and water for everyone while they wait. The owners are always there and just as friendly as their employees. I would highly recommend.

I really want to give Frost 4 stars just because they had great service and was so patient with us getting a million samples. But unfortunately I just didn't like the gelato...I tried at least 5 flavors and couldn't settle on any I liked too much so I stuck with the mango. However there was such an odd after taste after every bite, felt like milk/cream. I tried to ignore it but after a couple bites I couldn't handle the after taste anymore.  Since it got such rave reviews, maybe I should return and try more flavors... For now though please don't get the mango if you go.

Absolutely THE BEST GELATO!! AND the servers are always super friendly AND the place is always uber clean AND they offer a free gelato on your birthday.  A+++.  Oh, and the Sea Salt Caramel is to die for. :) It just doesn't get better than this.

This gelato is the best! They have every flavor you could think of and they are all so delicious. I remember the first time I came here and I felt like I was in Disneyland. I tried several different flavors but it was so hard to choose just one so I got two! This place is a dream and the gelato is to die for!

This is the best gelato in the US..we were there in a Saturday evening, and the line was out the door! No worries though..it goes quickly, and is definitely worth the few minutes it takes to get your tasty treat. Don't miss this!

I don't know what to say but absolute perfection, from the gelato, atmosphere, service, even the little cookie they put on the gelato. I've had the salted caramel twice and it's wonderful, rich and creamy. But not as many calories as normal ice cream?? Hard to believe but I'll believe it eat more!  Expect to wait especially on a weekend evening after dinner. Yum!

We hired Frost for our wedding and people LOVED it! It was one of the highlights of the night, that's for sure. Frost has always been one of our favorite places and we wanted to share that with everyone else. The service and price was excellent.

My family loves to go to Frost.   There are so many different flavors, and they all taste good.   They provide great customer service, and it's one of our favorite places to go!  Early Sunday afternoons seems like a good time to go when the lines are not too long.
Gelato is fantastic here. The flavor choices range from amazing chocolate to tropical delights!!! There is normally a long line but it's worth the wait!

Went here for the first time and came back for more today! This stuff is deeeeelicious. I was shocked when I learned that this stuff is lower calorie and significantly lower in fat than ice cream. Its so rich and flavorful. It is on the pricier side but it is well worth it! The smallest size is definitely satisfying in itself. So far I have tried the dark chocolate (decadent) , pistachio (amazing) and mango (refreshing and creamy)! Highly recommend this place!
Love eating here.. like a nice piece of Tucson here in Gilbert! They give me extra cookies when I ask.. and alway such a friendly staff!

My husband and I love Frost!!  One of the owners, I believe her name is Christina always acknowledges us and takes time to talk!. Every staff member is pleasant and patient. The Pistachio Gelato is to die for and we buy it by the quart!
This place is the real deal. We all go the bubble gum flavor. Wish I had a lifetime supply tub because now I'm stuck living 6 hours away.
In no way did they make me feel awkward about sampling all the flavors!
My favorite place to get gelato. All the flavors are all so good hard to pick just two. The price is good for the amount of gelato you get. I always look forward to coming and get my gelato fix.

The ratings on this place speak for itself. Definitely deserving of its 5 star rating. It is such a nice end to a meal,  or even just mid day snack! The only thing better then their gelato (sea salt caramel?!?!) is their service! The staff is practically shoving samples down your throat to the point you feel guilty for taking so many, "Can I try the Tiramisu please? ... and the Limoncello? ... and the Chai Tea?"  I don't tip places like this often, but always find myself placing a few dollars in the jar each visit.

Such as the great Santan Village Marketplace where Frost resides, this place is another neat place to bring out -of-town visitors. It looks modern, trendy, and clean on the inside. It's a fairly small place, but offers additional outdoor seating. The gelato is really good. My favorite and I think as in many others is the Salted Caramel gelato. It's creamy and has that nice taste mix  of sweet and salty. There are many other flavors as well. They have tasting spoons and it seems that anyone can sample an endless amount of gelato flavors (much to the annoyance of the people standing in line behind them.). The gelato displays are really creative with fruits, small coffee cups sticking out from the coffee gelato and other "accoutrements" depending on the flavors they are representing. It's a feast for the eyes as well as palettes. They also make milkshakes with the gelato. I've tried these too and they are great! The only negative thing is it is definitely over-priced, but again, it's trendy and you almost expect to pay a lot for a place like this.

My friends and I happened upon Frost Gelato by accident. From the moment we walked through the door, we were hooked. The staff is patient and friendly. The store is always clean and pristine. The music playing is always uplifting and popular. But most important: the gelato is to die for.   After day one, I could no longer eat normal ice cream without feeling disappointed that it wasn't gelato from Frost. The flavors are so spot-on and tasty that I couldn't help but try them all. Some of their seasonal flavors really hit the ball out of the park. Even their vanilla is a creamy delight that makes me want to go back for more. If you haven't tried this place out for yourself, you haven't truly lived and your tastebuds can't even fathom what they're missing.   They have delicious dietetic options and a large collection of dariy-free sorbets. Not to mention you can get them in drinks! Floats and shakes! It doesn't get any better than Frost Gelato.
Great gelato. The display is like art.. Refreshing and tasty. While at SanTan you must stop by.

Great anytime of the day month or year! Amazing flavor choices in sorbets and gelato. Had a nice tasting with the owner Kristen and recommend some amazingly delicious parings like dark chocolate and raspberry!
Not only is the gelato amazing, but so is the service! Everyone was kind and the manager even let me try EVERY SINGLE FLAVOR!

My first time to a gelato shoppe! The staff is VERY friendly and VERY customer service oriented. We have been 3 times in 2 weeks. They are very generous with how many samples you get also, with the kids also. This place ROCKS! My favorite is the Gel-latte (I think thats what its called)  Its like a milkshake but with fresh shots of espresso, no powders or ice used as fillers. Pure low fat gelato, milk and espresso! Its to die for!!! They do fundraisers also!

A great place to go if you're in the mood for ice cream but want something a little different. The gelato here comes in a ton of different flavors, so there is definitely something for everyone. The staff is young but they're efficient, move the line quickly and always are upbeat & friendly. The place is always packed and there isn't always enough seating. An employee always walks around offering cups of water and extra napkins, which is really nice.   We ordered two ice cream (gelato?) cakes for my daughter's my daughter's birthday. A bit pricey, but definitely worth it. Everyone loved it. The form online is kind of confusing so I went into the shop one morning. The staff was extremely helpful in making recommendations and filled out the form for me as I answered the questions. Highly recommend their cakes!
Amazing selection and great flavors. Always busy and easy to get to if your already at San tan mall.

Best ice cream ever!  Not sure if this is ice cream...it's gelato.  Not quite sure what that means but they are proud if it and have a good reason to be.  Gianduia (chocolate with hazelnut) is as close to perfection as you can get.  Hands down the ONLY ice cream (gelato) place to go in the east valley.

SO good! There's a lot of hype about Frost & I have seen their catering cart at several events so we finally checked this place out. The line was out the door on a Wednesday night and there must have been 30+ flavors to choose from (I chose vanilla/coconut). Prices are super fair and staff was friendly and helpful. Can't wait to try more!

Wow!  What an awesome treat! My partner and I stopped in on a nice Sunday afternoon after leaving a late lunch and shopping a bit. We've both never been to Frost Gelato so we were pretty excited.  The gentleman behind the counter was kind enough to let us sample any flavors we wanted with no hesitation.   We sampled the following: Pistachio, Amaretto, Green Tea, Nutella, Peanut Butter Crunch, Sea Salt Caramel, Roasted Almond, Honey and the Banana Sorbet. Yup, all those flavors :)  We decided to go with a Medium size to share and went with the Roasted Almond and Peanut Butter Crunch flavors.  We LOVED IT!    While sitting outside enjoying our gelato, the staff came outside about 2 or 3 times to offer the patrons cups of water.  That was really nice!  Next time we'll order something different and we will NOT be sharing :)

Our family loves this place. Sea salt Carmel makes me salivate just thinking about it. Typically there are long lines Friday and Saturday night so make sure you plan on that. Unlimited tasting. I wish I could have this every day but I would be as big as my house. It's soooo good!
Best Gelato in Arizona. There is a reason why the line is always out the door. We go back as often as possible.

I wish I could give less than a star. It may be good gelato but there's this one manger that works there that is a total b. She's middle-aged, on the heavier side, and blonde. She was rude and very unwelcoming. On top of that, whenever people would go in, she would head to the back as to not have to deal with anyone. I have looked at some of the other reviews and the people who gave this place one star always had to say something bad about this manager. Unless Frost fires her, we will not be going back. We'll stick to cold stone thank you.

Went here with my boyfriend while we were shopping in the area and we loved it! Everyone was very friendly, the place looked very clean, and they have so many different flavors to try! We loved it so much and will be back soon!

This place is amazing!!! We don't even think about going to any other gelato shop. There are so many amazing flavors are they are not stingy with the samples.  The salted Carmel is a must!!!  Lastly- the staff here is nice. The only reason I mention it is that there are many ice cream or yogurt shops  and most of the time the staff is poorly trained or just not friendly. At Frost they always smile and treat you like a person!!

Love this place! Flavors are all great and it is a healthier alternative to most other ice creams and even other gelato. I personally love the dietetic chocolate and peanut butter flavors. Only sweetened with natural sugar in the lactose!   It is generally a busy spot, so be prepared to wait.  It is well worth it though :)
Yum!! Rich flavor! Salted Carmel was out of this world!

Frost Gelato first caught my attention with their signage about being voted Phoenix's best dessert spot for two years in a row! After tasting their creamy concoctions, I have to agree that their gelato is pretty dang good. Great creamy consistency without any icy bits, and each featured flavor I sampled packed a punch.  Their Sea Salt Caramel is their best flavor, outselling all others at a rate of 5 to 1, and it was ultimately what I decided to get. I just rides the edge of being too sweet, with the salinity there to balance it out. I'm not much into sugar and couldn't even finish a small, but it was so good! Other flavors I enjoyed were their chocolate/hazelnut (like Nutella but not as rich), peanut butter chip (another best seller!), and coconut.

GREAT GELATO!! If you do not know anything about Gelato you need to check this place out!! It is some of the best Gelato/ ice cream/ frozen yogurt i have had in a long time! If you go on the Weekend Night you are going to have to wait in line! Last time i went it the line was out the door! We waited for 15 minutes, Well worth the wait! Do not be turned off by the line! You will be happy you waited!

MY VERY FAVORITE dessert in the valley! Every flavor is delicious. The workers are always so friendly and helpful. The gelato is incredibly creamy and flavorful. The price is fair. The store is always clean and well-kept. I can't say enough good things about this place!!

I stopped by Frost randomly on the hot summer day while I was in the area. By coincidence, it was exactly what I was looking for on a above 100 degree day. I've never heard of Frost and as I entered I was so impressed by all of the different flavors with its decorative displays. The staff were all very friendly allowing me to have as many samples as I wanted. This is really nice considering I was having an overload of options.   I was delighted with the smore's and the green tea. As I took my first scoop, the delicious creaminess was so good, it tickled my palate! I've had gelato in Argentina and found this to be just as good if not better! Will definitely be bringing my friends here for nice icy treat in the future!

How can you not give this place 5 stars?!  It is the best Gelato I have ever had, hands down! And there are plenty of places to go try in the Phoenix area... But if you're testing out yogurts & gelato shops, don't waste time anywhere else!  UHM and Helloooooo HOT CHOCOLATE!!  When it is in season (during cool weather) it is the best I've had... In my life!  Even the hubby who doesn't care for cocoa, drank half of mine! Thick, but smooth, not overbearing on sweetness, but made with gelato delicious! Oh, they also have Sorbet & this month features Margarita Sorbet... Hello! It didn't take us long for our little family of 5 to say farewell to Coldstone & their prices!

This gelato is a MUST HAVE. Salted Carmel and mint chocolate chip is my favorite. So refreshing and light. I always get the two flavors in a medium sized up. Don't let the line to get in fool you! These employees work fast and efficiently with a smile the whole way.

Yep!!  Another great frozen dessert place that I can go to on my travels.   This was excellent.  Very rich flavor so a smaller amount was sufficient.  Be prepared to stand in line for a period of time.  They allow sampling so everyone has to try samples which takes more time.  Well worth the wait.  Pricing very comparable to frozen yogurt places.

This was my first time at Frost and I was really impressed.  First off, it was Sat night, so the place was hoppin' and crowded.  None the less, the line moved really fast and the staff offering samples/tastings of everything were helpful and nice (usually, some places are stingy with samples, but here they weren't).  We chose the coconut and espresso and couldn't help but moan with every spoonful - so impressive!  They also had a young guy offering small glasses of water (to wash down the gelato) to patrons - nice touch!  The place is obviously popular and for a good reason - it's damn good Gelato!

Amazing amazing amazing!!  Always a long line for good reason and worth the wait!  Goes faster than it looks because they are efficient yet don't rush you. Kristin, the owner, is so nice and always helpful!

Good?  Yes, but not something that blew me away worthy of a 5 star review.  My preference for dessert is more geared toward refined and well balanced flavors.  I found that many of the Gelato flavors here hit me over the head and were too sweet or intensely flavored to have more than a few bites.  I tried three including the salted caramel which was way too sweet.  The espresso chip was a bit better but none in our party of three was able to finish a medium due to the richness.  I understand everyone has their own likes and many may love super rich flavors but after waiting on line for 15min to get some, I was not very impressed.   It is very clean inside and well decorated and there is some nice seating outside which is cool.  Unfortunately the flava-hamma was just too much for me.  :)

I have found that most of the gelato shoppes opening up around the valley aren't really gelato. This is the real thing! The only place I have had better gelato was in Amalfi, Italy! Great service, they are happy to let you try before you buy, really good portion sizes, and great selection. Beautiful displays. I also like that they have charts showing how much less calories/fat that gelato has then regular ice cream.

A bunch of my favorite Sun Devils and I tried this yummy gelato immediately after opting out of dessert at Brio next door.  That turned out to be the best decision of the week!  The line-out-the-door is justified (there are about 37 favors to try before committing), but made palatable by the mini sample cups the delightful employees distribute while you wait.  We tried salted caramel and mint chocolate chip while waiting to approach the counter.  Both were magnificent!  Everything we sampled was delicious but we all found favorites:  Dark chocolate, coconut, crunchy peanut butter, marbled black cherry, Amaretto, and espresso.  All were rich, creamy, delicious and fresh.  Please support this Tucson family-owned and operated business.  The welcoming atmosphere and fabulous gelato make a winning combination--even if there really is "red and blue in every bite".  :)

Across the nation our favorite gelato spot. The service is welcoming and cheerful offering you any sample of their beautifully displayed gelatos. One of the owners, kristen, is our favorite along with regular worker, marissa. Go. You won't be disappointed.

Frost is a fun spot to have close by! Located in the San Tan Village Mall, it is a quick jaunt from our house in Gilbert.   The shop is bright and clean and the gelato has been delicious every time. The staff are obviously trained to be outgoing and friendly, which shows.   I love that they have some great no-sugar added options like Banana and Peanut Butter, which makes for a guilt-free treat for my one year old :) I do wish that they offered a children's size option as my son never finishes even the smallest size and I hate to waste it.   They are almost always busy with a bit of a line, and their flavors change regularly. Herein lies one problem: their line runs in front of the display case for all of the gelatos, and the employees are stationed to help you as soon as you reach the beginning of the case. There is no way to see all of the flavors prior to an employee asking you what you would like, so its sometimes a bit stressful as a customer because you feel like you're behind the curve when you reach the counter.   We had a not-so-great encounter on a busy night with one male employee who seemed very annoyed with us that we were not ready to order when he asked us, and kept asking us if we "wanted anything else" while we were still deciding.   I think that this could be corrected by adjusting how the line is set up and/or by providing current lists of the flavor options either posted in an easily visible place at the start of the line or printed copies of the current flavors that guests can review while waiting in line. (they do offer a list of flavors, however it is a generic list that includes seasonal flavors that aren't always available, so this is frustrating because it is easy to pick out a flavor only to find out that it isn't available once you reach the front of the line)   Outside of those snags, it is really a great place and we enjoy going there regularly.

Such a fun and delicious frozen dessert! I love gelato!   The employee's are all friendly and happy to let you taste any of there delicious flavors. Personal fav's are the hazelnut, salted carmel and tangelo (which tasted like a tart orange creamsicle.)   MUST TRY!!!

Great gelato is to be had here. They even had non- dairy options for my wife. I personally love chocolate and there are too many flavors for me to try. The best part is they let you sample everything you desire. The three scoop option is the best priced for my tastes. It's one of the best desserts in San Tan Mall

THE best gelato shop in town! My all time favorite is the mango with chili but that's a seasonal flavor! I also really like the raspberry mixed with the mango, sweet and tangy just the way I like it!  You can sample as many as you want and the employees are very friendly and patient with you.  It gets packed during the weekend so beware of a very long line especially in the evenings!   If it's your birthday, you receive a small cup of gelato! Highly recommend this for anyone who's craving something cold and delicious!

Frost won my heart!! I was visiting my mom in Chandler and got a craving for some gelato. I did a Yelp search, and Frost popped up. I told mom,we put my kids in the car, and rolled out. It is located in the middle of a really cute outdoor shopping center, I'm not from there, so I don't remember what it is called, but anyway.....There was a line out the door...good sign...but it moved quickly.. even better sign. They even had someone going around giving out samples while we waited! Yes!! So, me, mom, and my 10 y.o. each got 2 flavors. I think I got Amaretto and Cherry.. this was last August..lol. But anyway, gelato was great! So good, my 10 year old wants to go to the Frost in OC. So if you are in the area, check them out. Good stuff!!
Best Gelato in the valley. I love the blended Gelatte (coffee latte and Gelato). A must try.

Awesome! Awesome! Awesome!  Great selection of AUTHENTIC Gelato!  Wonderful flavors, including seasonal selections that change frequently. The Sea Salted Caramel and Dark Chocolate are beyond delicious!  An Arizona company (based in Tucson) with local franchise owners. These people CARE about quality and their customers.... probably one of the reasons they won "Best Of Phoenix"  We no longer go anywhere else in the phoenix metro area for Gelato

I wanted to see what the long line was about. It then became one of my favorite gelato shop here in AZ. Unlimited tries for gelato flavors and they serve a cup of water to lighten up that sweetness.  Get the medium size which will give you two flavors of your choice with a good price of $5. I love the Pistachio and the Sea Salt Caramel, which I would always get, as much as I would say I'd try another flavor..eh I never do. :p
The sea salt and caramel is to die for!! Yummy!! Even with the smallest size you get so much. And I love the little wafer on top

Great Treats!!! I've been to Italy many times and have eaten A LOT of gelato- this is exceptional.  The atmosphere is really nice, super clean and the staff is very friendly.  You should give them a try- you'll go back. I had the dark chocolate combined with the cherry. Too bad I have to leave tomorrow morning.
This is the only place I've been to that have frozen desserts that taste JUST LIKE the flavors they are advertised to. It's delicious.

Great product, great customer service. Smiles and super helpful staff. Free tasting and free water offered every time. Love the coconut flavor among others. We have special ordered the Frost Bites also it's a super treat and you can get any flavor.

I live in Colorado and somehow had heard about this place, so of course I HAD to try it while I was in town visiting.  I was not disappointed, this place is awesome!  The gelato is delicious, but also, the place is cute, the presentation of the gelato is gorgeous and the employees were nice, helpful and provided great, friendly service.  If you will be anywhere close to this place, you need to stop here!
We ordered ice cream cake and Jonathan was great.  Great options  But be ready to stand in line as they always so busy :-)

Frost wasn't on my radar when I saw it appear at San Tan because I thought it would be like all the other chains at the mall. Ice Cream/gelato/froyo places are a dime a dozen around here, and there aren't many that are worth the caloric indulgence. Luckily, a fellow foodie coworker of mine raved about and mentioned a few flavors worth trying.  The gelato here is very good; it's even better than some of the places I've tried in Italy. I tried the pistachio and chocolate hazelnut. Next time I'm going for the coconut or amaretto. My husband got the recommended blackberry cabernet sorbet, and I was very impressed how strongly the wine flavor came through. I hope the Mormons know to avoid that one.  What I don't like about this place is it still does have that chain feel to it. The TV showcases Frost franchise opportunities. They offer way too many flavors for me to feel confident that they can excecute them all well (and really?! bubblegum gelato...gross!). It's not a good value either. They won't let you get two flavors with the small cup. My favorite place in Italy let you get 3, and it was cheaper.  I'll be back to Frost because the flavors are great, and it's so close to my house. I'll just have to become blind to some of the chain qualities they exhibit.

Frost never disappoints. This location is always clean, the staff is always very friendly, and the gelato is delicious.   The shakes are also delicious and they are very creamy. These are always my go to when I don't want gelato. They have tons of different gelato flavors and they also have various sorbet flavors as well.   They also offer free small cups of water and they also sell coffee. Catering is available and they make cakes for special occasions.   Come here if you have a sweet tooth! You will not be disappointed!

Frost Gelato is quite the desert hot spot. (No pun intended) It is a beautiful building placed right in the center of town. Although, there are positives and negatives to being in the center of town, and it is also the reasoning behind my 4-star rating. The lines build up quick during highlight times of the day, and if the building were placed in a less booming area of town, I really think that Frost could benefit greatly. Overall, Frost is a delicious gelato bar that easliy outshines it's competition whilst remaining tasty and beautiful.                -Justin C, aspiring food critic

I love this place. The gelato is amazing and the sherbet is even better.  On weekends, you can expect the line of customers to extend down the sidewalk for quite a ways, but it is well worth the wait.

Line was not bad on a saturday. It moved quickly. Read paper on counter to see all the flavors rather than walking and trying to look at all the overwhelming colors etc. way easier to see what they have and make a decision. $5 for a medium which gives you two flavors. It was a little too much for me to eat. Overall it tasted great and I would go back.

Great place with awesome dairy free flavors and is open late. I really loved how flavorful the gelato  tasted. Cool thing about some of the flavors are that they are infused with alcohol like champagne and vodka. I tried the Bellini which is peaches and champagne and lemoncello is lemonade and vodka! I could a whole tub of this! So good!!! I recommend this place if you're in the area and want to splurge. We each got the medium size and 2 scoops of our flavor choice and it came out to 11.00.

No wonder this place is rated top dessert in the entire valley! High quality gelato, an abundance of flavor options(and products beyond scoops of gelato) and great service. The line on a Thursday evening was very long and extended down the sidewalk. Clearly the most hoppin' place at the mall. It was well worth the wait and while we were in line a sweet staff member brought out a tray with cups of water.   They are liberal with their samples so don't be afraid to try as many as you wish. I tried the cookies and cream, mint chip and sea salt caramel. Since I only wanted a small, I could only choose one flavor (2 flavors for med. Cup). Next time, I need to try Nutella and get the mint chip. I went with the cookies and cream this time, which was awesome. Hubby really loved his sea salt caramel.   There is a bit of seating, both inside and out and not too cramped next to the line. Family-friendly and worth the price, which was less costly for us than a trip to the frozen yogurt shop. We will definitely be back...probably sooner than our waistlines would approve. :-)

The go to ice cream (or gelatto) place for my wife and I. My wife has nut allergies and they do have some gelatto flavors with nuts in it, but they will go to the back where they keep the surplus ice cream to scoop my wife's flavor to make sure there is no possibility of cross contamination.  They have a variety of different gelatto flavors as well as sorbet.  I usually end up trying about 3-4 different flavors before making the difficult decision and settling in on one flavor

Best Gelato EVER. The sea salt caramel is their specialty and to absolutely die for. I also love the black cherry. They have many flavors plus the presentation of the gelato is phenomenal. The employees are helpful and always offering samples of anything you want.

Stopped in tonight to satisfy a late night gelato craving. First time here was phenomenal. Staff was extremely friendly, prices were fair, selection was wide and the atmosphere was very approachable and comfortable. A modern and sleek look you won't find anywhere else.   Well, the gelato was fantastic and all but the only reason why I can't give this place a five star review is for one reason and one reason only- the portion sizes. Typically, when I order ice cream or gelato, I go overboard and get sick so instead of ordering a large, I ordered a medium. Well, the medium was more of a small. I mean, it was really small and was frankly surprised by the sizes they have to offer. I understand gelato is expensive and a hot commodity but for $5, I was expecting at least a little bit more than what I got. It was delicious until it was gone in about 3 minutes. It literally didn't make it home (and we're two minutes down the road). It was just a cup of sadness when I pulled into the driveway.  Other than that, it was great. Increase your portions even just a LITTLE bit and you have yourself an award winning gelato shop. Five star shop, hands down if the value is squared away.  RECOMMENDATION: Roasted peanut and peanut butter crunch. Together, it makes a combination of flippin' heaven. It is absolutely incredible and you're really missing out.

Everytime I visit the Gilbert area, a stop at Frost Gelato is a must. Its tucked away in a outdoor mall, and during peak times you may have to wait in line along with other Frost fans. But the line moves fairly quickly and soon enough you'll be in.   1. Samples - One of the nice perks of this place is the free samples - the servers are genuinely happy to give you as much tasters as you want. And its definitely encouraged to try as much flavors as you can, in order to get the complete idea of what Frost has to offer.   2. Dem flavors - Easily the top flavor is Roasted Almond (subtle and creamy at once, so good), along with Pistachio and blackberry. But there's so many to choose from, it'd take multiple visits to try them all.  3. Protip - ask for a cup of water, the gelato can get a bit overwhelming at times.  Easily the best place in Gilbert for dessert!
Okay the gelato here is absolutely tasty! One small cup ranges between 132-160 cal! Had the biscotti flavor -- yum!
FREE small gelato on your birthday!!!!!! Just show your id. Amazing gelato! My favorite is pistachio! The Nutella is axing as well! Must try the affogatto next time!!! Best gelato in AZ!!

Decently good gelato, variety of flavors, would definitely come back here again. Went here on a Saturday night with family and relatives. The place is definitely NOT great for big groups, and expect a line out the door if you go during busy times. They do have some outdoor seating. Cant remember what flavor I got but it was good. Id rank them higher than gelato spot for sure. They should open another place between biltmore and san tan.
This place is consistently great. Typically long lines, but usually worth the wait. Try the roasted marshmallow gelato, one of the best kept secrets they have.

Awesome new gelato shoppe!! It's so delicious that we have been here twice already in the same week...and were recognized by the staff already. They even remembered what we ordered the first time we went. Impressed! Very friendly, fun and helpful staff! They offered tons of samples and suggestions for mixing flavors to resemble candy bars, desserts, fruity drinks etc.  I tried out their chocolate hazelnut, tastes exactly like those Ferrero Rocher chocolates [Heaven]! We also tried their dark chocolate and coconut ~ put it in the same spoonful and you'll be in Almond Joy heaven - sans almond [with a lot less guilt] :) They even offer a glass of water while youre enjoying your gelato, really nice touch!
Best thing I have ever tasted.  The salted caramel is delicious.  My fave is the marble raspberry... Happy camper for sure!!!

After visiting Total Wine, which is also mind blowing, we were driving by and I saw the magic words "gelato". HIT the brakes! We needed to park, and I needed to indulge. It was our first time at this joint and I wasn't dissapointed.   We walked in and were greeted with smiles and pleasantries. The girl working asked if we have ever been there before and I replied 'no'. So we got the whole run down, from ingredients to chef (both imported from Italy), to how many samples we could have (unlimited!) I think I tried 8 different kinds before going with the Amaretto and the Almond.   Creamy, smooth, rich and totally worth stopping. The flavours were out of this world. I usually go for Pistachio, and yes it was delicious. It even had real pistachios! I needed to break out of my box though. My mom had the Pineapple and the Almond, also very good. Next time, I'm getting Strawberries and Champagne!   So thank you to FROST and Kristin, it really made my day on this trip to Mesa. Hopefully I'll see you again before I leave on Tuesday!  PS. Totally worth the money!
The best gelato this side of Italy. Friendly staff that will graciously offer to let you sample as many flavors as you would like.

I have been here a lot and this literally has the best gelato I have ever tasted. The flavors are very good and they have a great variety of them. The place is very clean and pretty. Their products are very fresh and I highly recommend it to anyone who has not been here!

My husband and I love us some gelato and have had a difficult time finding a top notch spot since our favorite shop closed a year ago. We didn't know of the hype surrounding Frost when we passed by it the other night, but were excited to try something new. We ordered the toasted marshmallow, banana and peanut butter. All were excellent!

I'm from the Midwest where good gelato is hard to come by. Every time I visit AZ I have to get gelato! Frost gelato is the second gelato store I have visited as I've frequented another gelato place in old town-Scottsdale. Frost gelato was clean, the service was quick (w/ long lines), the staff were friendly, and I loved the location as it was in a shopping, entertainment, and restaurant outlet. I would definitely revisit frost gelato in the future

Frost is the first place I ever got gelato that I actually liked! I think one of the reasons that this location is so popular is because it's a storefront that opens up to the outdoor mall. It's absolutely the best place to stop for something cool and delicious on a hot Arizona day. They have a huge variety of flavors and although the line is often out the door, the service is pretty quick and the staff is friendly. My personal favorite flavors are stracciatella and chocolate, which are amazing together. The gelato is cold and creamy and served with a little cookie to go with it. Worth the wait!
Great place! The Gelato is fresh and you can try all the different types! I am quite fond of the strawberry champagne myself! It is amazing!
The best gelato around short of being in Spain - not as creamy and the selection seems to stay very regular vs. new flavored but still no better around.

Pretty good gelato shop with many flavors. They have a variety of classic flavors, like chocolate, pistachio, and cookies and cream, while they have seasonal flavors, such as cinnamon apple pie and pumpkin spice during the fall. If you are looking more for a fruit gelato, they have that too, from flavors like mango, raspberry and even pineapple. Diabetic or watching your sugar and wondering if they can accommodate? They have 2 flavors that do not have added sugar.  If gelato isn't your thing, don't fret. They also sell coffee and espressos. If you want a bit of both, they have specialty gelato shakes, with or without espresso. You have the option of a small to large, and have the chance to do a split scoop with the medium and large flavors. Feel free to sample different flavors if you can't decide. Additionally, they have some pre-packaged containers that you take home with you.  It is not a good place for large groups because there are few tables and seats. There is seating indoors and outdoors if you're lucky and want to chat for awhile.

So far, I have tried some certain flavors. Rum raisin, champagne and dark chocolate are two of my most favorite flavors. I really like that this place opens late until 10pm, so it would never be too late for me to drive 5mins away from my home to this place for a sweet cup before bed (yes, I do have sweet tooth). The portion is just great, and they surely let you know the calories you take in comparing to ice cream. Menu is easy to follow, and staff are patient while waiting for me to find out what I really want. And it usually gets pretty busy on Saturday night, so get in line and get ready for some of that yummy frost.

Very friendly, patient employees dealing with ridiculously long lines. They let you sample as much as you want Nd even bring samples and water to people waiting in line. The gelato flavors are robust and excellent. A fun stop post movie.
This place has the best Gelato I have ever had in my life, wide assortment of flavors, super fast service!!!! Wod definitely recommend.
I love gelato and Frost never disappoints. With a large variety of flavors and the chance to sample before you order, you can't go wrong. So yummy.

In the middle of forsaken Gilbert there is a mall, and in that mall there is an amazing gelato shop.  Big line, bit of a wait, but very worth it on a semi-warm AZ day.  All kinds of super enhanced flavors, you just want to try them all and never stop eating.  The staff seems to get off on being super excited and friendly which is a fun enhancement.  The only disappointment was when I got to the cashier and they waited about 2 minutes fiddling about and cleaning things before they realized I was ready to purchase, even though I sat right in front of them staring in their eyes and waiting patiently.  They didn't apologize.

This place is great.  Their no sugar added chocolate is wonderful and I feel less guilty eating it.  Staff are friendly, they manage crowds well and when really busy they are out handing out water and visiting with people in line while moving folks through the process.     Their product is the best gelato I've found anywhere.

Finally a gelato shop that rivals THE Gelato Spot in Scottsdale. I went to the one in tucson years ago so its nice that they finally opened one up nearby.  Clean, cool, and fresh atmosphere. It's in a good location at the San Tan Village and is open late (well comparably late to everything else in Gilbert) til 10pm.  The service is friendly, samples galore, they bring you water and they KNOW their gelato. The service here tops that of the gelato spot.   As for the taste, it's pretty damn good. I really enjoy the stracciatella and hazelnut. Don't really care for the sea salt caramel or the amaretto. Either way, if you're in the area don't do dessert at any of the restaurants - come here instead. Great way to cool off with a treat.
This place is amazing! I'm not a big ice cream/gelato person but this stuff is to die for.
Absolutely the best gelato in the Valley!  So many delicious flavors of gelato and sorbet. Sugar free options as well. Friendly service.  Their shakes are the absolute best!  So worth the drive!

Absolutely delicious and an extremely excited/friendly staff! I always get greeted the moment I walk through the door. The gelato hits the spot and they always have some new/fun flavor of the season. I loved the Guinness flavor and irish whiskey flavor for St. Patricks day.

The best Gelato ever...EVER!!!  Yeah I said it.  What?  Seriously, the best customer service I've experienced since the '70s.  By the time I ordered I was nearly full because they encourage customers to try everything - easily 20 different favors to sample and choose from.  My favorites are the dark chocolate, salted caramel, peach champagne, and black cherry.  We've visited multiple times and have never been disappointed - same quality service and deliciousness every time.  My kids referred them to a friend and he owner gave my kids free gelato on their next visit - they appreciate their customers.  If your looking for your next vice, check this place out!

We love this place! The people are always so friendly and the gelato is great. They have so many flavors to choose from. During the summer the line is usually out the door but the staff work fast so the line moves quickly.

I've had gelato here a few times before. I had a quick question about what flavors or new seasonal flavors they had available. I called him up and they had me stay on hold for a longer than five minutes ridiculous.

This is as authentic as it gets!! My in laws brought the hubby and I to this place to get an afternoon treat and boy where we in for a treat! Word on the street is that the line for this place normally wraps around the building, but when we arrived we were able to walk right in. The server allowed us to try different flavors before we made our selection. If you purchase a medium size you can get two flavors and if you choose a large you can choose 3 flavors. The medium size is more than enough to eat alone, but if your are big on sweets go for the large! All of the flavors I tasted were amazing!Once I tasted this place I had flash backs of when I used to live in Europe and had amazing gelato and ice cream there, this tasted so close to that! I wasn't able to finish my ice cream because my husband finished mine for me, but I really enjoyed what I tasted and would love to go back when I am back in Phoenix.

If you hanging out at Santan Village Mall especially on a warm day there's nothing more refreshing than this gelato. My wife always expects that this is our dessert spot anytime we are anywhere close to having dinner near Santan mall. The ingredients are fresh, samples are free, employees are friendly and the gelato is delicious. Don't be surprise if you arrive in the evening and The line is crazy long but it's worth the time to hang out for the party in your mouth.

Best dessert place, hands down, that I have ever been too. The gelato is perfectly smooth and comes in an awesome variety of flavors. I come here every time I'm in Phoenix for baseball with my son. Can't recommend this place enough.
Best in the valley for a reason. Helpful staff, they encourage you to taste it all if you want. Two thumbs way up from this fan!

Love, love, love this place!! You won't want dessert anywhere else once you try Frost Gelato. Don't let the long lines scare you away. They do an amazing job of moving the line quickly without sacrificing customer service! Which, by the way, has been outstanding every time and we go quite often.
Love frost!!! I always get great service and the gelato is amazing. I love the seasonal flavors. You can try any of the flavors too.

I'm always at the San Tan mall and this shop is always busy. I have wanted to go in for the longest time but wasn't so sure. I went in tonight and got the sea salt Carmel. A must the best! I was very happy with frost and will be coming back every time I'm in the area. Btw there's a ton of other flavor that also look amazing. You have to check it out.

We have been going to Frost since they first opened their doors. They are by far my family's favorite gelato shop. We recently returned from Italy and tried many gelato shops. I have yet to find one that can compete with Frost.   The service is excellent as well. They are all very helpful and attentive.

Went on a Saturday evening and waited in line for about 10 minutes and it was every bit worth the wait!! Wide selection for everyone and they even let sample before buying. The only tough thing is there's not a lot of outdoor seating but it's more for eating while on the go.

I was Frost bitten when the first location opened in Tucson. Since 2008, I have tried numerous gelato places and none have come close to the creaminess, tastiness and overall authentic fare as Frost. Each dip of the spoon is reminiscent of my travels abroad in Italy with memories that bring a smile to my face and pleasure to my tongue.   The San Tan village location is 25 minutes away but the drive is worthwhile. The staff is friendly, helpful and armed with spoons for you to sample any flavor you wish. I went with the dark chocolate and salted caramel. Truly delightful! Word on the street is there are 3 locations to pop up around the Phoenix area. I think Tempe would be a great choice! Hint hint....
This place is crazy good. Constant line out the door anytime of the day, but SO worth the wait. Much less fat and calories than ice cream and a million times better.

Always fabulous! It doesn't matter what sort of crazy long line there is outside this place (And there almost always is one late into the night) it loves quickly and the staff is pleasant and efficient!   Everything I've tried is great and they serve realistic portions.

Delicious. I tried more than 10 flavors and I liked them all. I wound up deciding on 3 scoops from roasted almond, French Vanilla and Salted carmel mixed into a coffee drink.  The young lady, Jess, made it not only an enjoyable experience but educational as she told me how they made the different flavors and how the ingredients are flown in from Italy. I was very impressed.  Thanks for the delicious treat!

Frost is a cute, tasty, trendy place to go for dessert. They have a great selection of gelato to choose from and they let you have as many samples as you need to find the right flavor for you. This place is so yummy that it's no wonder why there is always a line out the door. I highly recommend this place.

I've been wanting to try Frost Gelato for a while. Every time I've visited San Tan, I noticed the line was out the door. This time, it wasn't so bad so I decided to try it. They had a huge variety of gelato flavors. Some were fruity, some cake like flavors, some with alcohol and the most important, some were dairy free. They encourage you to try the flavors and pick your favorite. My husband and I both decided to go fruity for the day. I ordered a mango scoop and he ordered lemon. Both were very delicious. I usually don't like lemon but decided to try a spoon from his and it was amazing!! Like eating a frozen bite of a delicious fresh lemonade.   They have indoor and outdoor seating areas. The inside was not so busy but the weather was great we wanted to sit outside. The seating area outside was absolutely full so we sat on the bench facing the store.   They came out a few minutes later with a tray full of water cups offering them to all their customers, a very nice gesture we thought!   Nice place with good quality gelato and excellent service. Definitely worth a visit if you're in the area.

This place is brilliant. I read that they were one of the top places in the USA to get our nation's favorite chilled treat... So of course, like any reputable connoiseur  would- I had to try it out to scrutinize the product... ;) The staff was super helpful and friendly. They have so many drool worthy flavors to choose from and you get unlimited samples! :) The hard part is settling on a flavor because they are all so delicious. My husband and I both opted for Mediums so we could try two flavors (well- four if we share)- I got Armaretto and Tiramasu and he got their famous Salted Caramel (and he doesn't even like caramel!) and Coffee (which is lucky decaf for those who need it to be). O...M...G...! The gelato was gorgeous. I think our favorite was the salted caramel. Yum. Fabulous prices. Famous gelato. I would recommend you give it a try. And we also have other flavors to check out as well. ;)

My sister says "You know, I wish there was a place where they serve ice cream and coffee, so we can all be happy!"  Her wish is Frost's command.   Open until 11pm...YES!  Their gelato is sooooo delicious, rich and creamy and almost half the calorie of a regular ice cream!  There were so many to chose from, I missed the ones with liquor (limoncello, strawberries and champagne, etc.)  Gotta try that next time.  Tantalizing display case that the owner, Rowena, is very proud of.  You have to go and see it for yourself.  I got a medium size with two flavors of pistachio and hazelnut.  Darn, I forgot what my hubby got, but he really liked it.  He also ordered a cup of cappuccino that he raved about, too.  My little cutie pie had his gelato bubblegum fix. "Mmmm...this is soooo good!"  He put a generous spoonful in his little mouth.  I still don't get why he likes that flavor so much.   The rest of our group enjoyed theirs, as well.  We want to try the 23 flavors gelato mini cone tree next time.  The service was impeccable.  Rowena does an awesome job at managing her employees.  They were all very personable and helpful with sincere smiles.  She told us that she gives them a bonus and/or incentives when patrons commend on their job well done.  So make sure you let management know how they do!  It was a beautiful rainy summer night so a group of us stayed for a couple more hours chatting outside while the kids enjoyed getting soaked .  The girls came out and offered us cold water.  They never made us feel like we've overstayed our welcome.    We have a new favorite!!!

Still bomb! Additional flavors I enjoy are strachiatella (sp?) & biscotti de creme aka chocolate chip & cookies and cream.   If you enjoy mint & chip, you'll like theirs. It reminds me of a York peppermint pattie. Pretty legit.  But still - my all time favorite is the toasted almond!

I came here with a friend and the gelato was amazing and the service was beyond extraordinary. They have a friendly staff that is ready to help and spread good vibes, they put me in a great mood for the rest of my day. We'll definitely be coming back soon!!

Love this location! I talked with the owner's daughter and she was so patient and nice and showed us some cool flavors we wouldn't normally try. This place is the real deal - their ingredients are fresh and their flavors may be amazing but the customer service is just as amazing. Always a line, so you know it's good!

Our family loves FROST!  I personally don't like how much it costs for the 5 of us to go so for that reason we keep it a special treat.  The staff is so friendly and sweet.  Always a nice touch!  I'm somewhat addicted to the cheesecake gelato with strawberry sorbet either in a cup, cone or shake I can't seem to order anything different!!    Their flavors are authentic and surprisingly low in calories and fat!  Bonus for the waistline!!
Sea salt carmel + peanut butter=heaven!  Love it

This place is soo good! You can try any flavor, they are super patient, great prices, haven't found a flavor we didn't like chocolates, coffees, fruits, caramels, all good! Been here a thousand times and just found out they mix awesome milkshakes from multiple flavors!

So glad we found this place! So many options. Makes you want to come back time after time to try all the flavours! Friendly staff. Little on the expensive side for dessert but the experience was well worth it!
Have you ever felt your skin after you just shaved with a new razor AND Exfoliated? Yeah that's how smooth this gelato is.

Great atmosphere, they have so many flavors! if you like gelato, they have the best I have tasted, my husband likes going here ALL the time. Everyone is always so friendly when we go, and we go a lot lol

I have always been impressed with this place since day one.  The staff here are friendly and patient, always making the customers feel welcome. They're helpful with great suggestions and don't get annoyed when I sample almost every flavor (I have a very grievous case of indecisiveness).  Gelato is smooth and light, with very balanced flavors. My favorites are the dark chocolate, roasted almond, alpen caramel, and toasted marshmallow. Even the bubblegum one is divine.
