But whatever flavor you get, I've yet to try one that wouldn't be worth the price. With that being said it is a little pricier. Although the owner told us that all the ingredients come from Italy to help make it a more authentic experience, so the cost is understandable.  The shop is always clean, neat, and orderly. Even the bathrooms. That's a plus.  Store owner and managers are kind, and not over bearing trying to sell you everything on the menu like some restaurants. It's nice to be able to engage in real conversation without it seeming like an endless sales pitch.  If you're ever in the area, give this place a try! It does get incredibly busy on the weekend nights, with lines out the door. I suggest going during lunch time on a weekday to avoid having such a wait.

Not only good gelato but great service! I picked up a chocolate and then got some mini sized flavor to go! I wanted to surprise my boys after school for being so awesome. The packaged them up in little To go containers and with a carrier and spoons. They really took the time to do it right! In a world where service just seems optional they made it a must! Great employees!    However, I will attach a photo for your review!

My wife and I love this place!  It's a great date night place to go. They make the best Gelato that I have had in America. We went to Italy recently and that has been the only place that I have had better Gelato.

Simply "Frost"'is a family owned company. It's a local favorite. They let you sample "or try before you buy" so you know you'll like what you order. Always friendly, always delicious. This is a place I bring visitors as no one has had a bad word to say about it. Just a few steps away from a playground for the kids (and a splash pad in warm months) it's a kid- friendly place. Be prepared for a line though on evenings and weekends. It's a great place that the locals frequent!!!

To be fair, we came here right after eating a large meal so I wasn't as hungry.  There were busy and I felt rushed in trying and finding something to eat.  My server was very helpful in recommendations and helped me pick something that tasted very much like a Creme Brulle.  I would recommend getting something rather small after a meal unless you have lots of room, it was rather rich.

Delicious!!!  I'm so happy this place opened close to where I live!  They have such great flavors, rich taste, and just the right consistency.  I like to pick one flavor to try and then ask the servers which other flavor compliments my chosen flavor.  They know what's good!  All of the servers are really nice and helpful.  Unique to Frost: They bring you water.  Awesome!  Flavors to try: Sea Salt Caramel, Strawberries and Champagne, and Bellini
My favorite gelato is at the foot of the Ponte Vecchio in Florence, Italy.  My second favorite is Frost. Do I really need to say anymore?
Very large selection of flavors.  Plentiful tasting spoons.  Helpful and informative staff.  Tasty gellato.  Get a scoop just about every time I am at San Tan Village.

Stopped into Frost after the movies at San Tan Mall it's on Painted Sky Drive next to Brio, Wow what awesome gelato!  Cannot wait to go back.  Very cool place with a great vibe, the staff was so friendly and kind.  They even gave us waters because it was brutally hot out and I just really am happy to see a gelato shop at our mall.  We had espresso flavor, they explained to us that all ingredients are flown in from Italy and have fewer calories than regular ice cream, I don't even care about the calories I just want MORE - I hope they do well at San Tan and are around a long long time I really can't wait to try more flavors.

After a dinner date this was suggested for a treat...so glad it was! The line was long but it was a Saturday night. I can understand why now too. Every flavor we sampled was so good and no guess about what flavor they were. I ended up with the chocolate hazelnut & raspberry. We will be back! We loved the smiles and the cashier was so friendly! As a business owner ourselves a friendly personality goes along way!!

We have been faithful customers for years! The line moves fast, so don't let it scare you away! So many amazing flavors to choose from.  The gelato is to die for.  We have so many favorites, whether your in the mood for fruity or chocolate you will be happy. I love the salted caramel, my husband is a chocolate or Nutella guy and my daughter will go from salted caramel to other delicious fruity choices.   The staff is always friendly, I love that when the line is long they offer you water and samples.  Always pay attention to their seasonal options, toasted marshmallow or s'more is AMAZING!
Love, love, love Frost! Excellent service!!! Excellent gelato! It will roll your eyes back in your head, it is that good!
Fabulous friendly place with a product "to die for".  Every flavor fantastic.They even had a non dairy item. Will surely return and it's not close to me at all.  Too bad not more seating. *****

Frost Gelato Shoppe in Gilbert, is the best. The atmosphere's is awesome  and so are the workers. 1st they treat you like family 2nd remember your name which is unique, 3rd always welcome you to try numerous flavors of Gelato. My lil boy wants to come for his bday lol =). It's like 2 starbucks and you can't get enough of it, haha. Thanks Doug,Ro and Kristen you all are Amazing! Great Job =)
Why doesn't Frost have a 5 star rating?   It does in my book. Delicious, always a line out the door.  Awesome flavors,  Too many to count. Gelato, sorbet, milk/coffee shakes...COME DOWN
Delicious! And the staff is super friendly, courteous, and helpful.

Best gelato in the East Valley.  All of the standards plus a few unique flavors such as the salted caramel.  The gelataio behind this place has a great pedigree and the East Valley should cherish his craftsmanship.

This place is the best!  The staff is friendly and are happy to share flavor samples with the patrons. We were outside eating our Gelato and one of the staff members brought complimentary water out to us.  I will definitely add Frost to my short list of food places to frequent.
Excellent customer service, great gelato, fun place....love it. Met the owner and they were out serving guests - which was nice to see.

After more than a year and a half this remains my favorite gelato place, bar none.  Based on the lines I see here most of the time, I'm not alone!  To their credit, they manage to move the line pretty quickly while still giving very good service.  Probably my only complaint is that their orange gelato is "seasonal", and so you can't get it all the time.  Tonight it was gone (though they had "spicy chocolate", which really was spicy...burning the throat several seconds after swallowing).  So tonight I got the limoncello.  Good stuff!  They also have a gelato shake (which my daughter says is great), and a gelato cake (which I plan to try sometime!).  And on your birthday you get a free small (piccolo).  Which is pretty cool.  I just keep coming back for more.

Well Sir, this be a good place. You would think Gelato is Gelato and for most places that is the case. Here at Frost it seems they truly take the Gelato world by the horn and do their best to give you loads of amazing (and some not so amazing) different flavors. I am particular when it comes to my cold goodnesses of sin and Frost hits the craving on its head. The little chocolate sticks they place in the gelato add some needed crunch for the creamy goodness. We will be going again for the 3rd time in the next week for my birthday.
The gelato here is always fresh and always tasty! I have never been to this place when there is not a long line and there is a reason for this. It is great! You can't go worng with this place.

The hype is justified.  The most robust blend of high quality mouth watering gelato and excellent customer service.  The smiley, friendly and knowledgable young woman who helped us was quick to hand us sample after sample all while tossing a bits of knowledge about each flavor.  I sampled the Pistachio which was incredibly rich. She noted it was the most costly to make of all the gelatos (but the price was not higher).  After about 5 samples I settled on half cheesecake half black cherry at her recommendation.  I nearly inhaled the entire medium cup in 30 Seconds.  I found myself trying to slow down so I don't choke or die of a brain freeze.  Do they put crack in this stuff?!?  My wife got the cookies n cream... Though it's called by some super fancy shmancy name there.  So good, best she's ever had.    They also come with these little wafer cylinder shaped things that taste just like a fresh cone.  There was a super friendly kid walking around giving out samples to those waiting in the long line.  He was also passing out iced waters and making quick chit chat.  While we're gorging on our delicious treats they are playing a video of how they make their stuff.  We saw the espresso and gelato thing they make and decided we are coming back tomorrow!  So much to try!    Ok I'll shut up now.

Gelato Fun!  Cool little place in the San Tan Mall area in Gilbert.  Friendly staff and tons of Gelato and sherbet flavors.  I got the large which means I got 3 flavors since one is just not enough when they are all good.  I got Toasted Marshmallow, Peanut Butter Crunch, and White Chocolate Macadamia Nut.  Frost Gelato first off is super flavorful, dense, silky, and smooth.  Every flavor they offer tastes exactly like the description to the T.  The cool thing about Gelato is that it is healthier/less calories than ice cream.  So, if you are looking for a cool dessert on a hot AZ night check out frost and get some guilt free dessert.    BrandonFitFoodie

I've never considered myself a connoisseur of gelato. I've had it once or twice and never been bowled over. until i had Frost gelato. It's a heavenly flavor explosion in my mouth. I combined 2 flavors into a delicious mixture that tasted like creme brulee. But sampling all the other flavors was just as great! they have such a wide selection and deciding was really the toughest part. Their Bellini and strawberries and champagne sorbet was also to die for. They were creamy and rich, but contain no dairy! How do they do that?! I recommend trying a frost bite while you're there as well. A small dollop of gelato surrounded by chocolate. What could be better? I'm so excited the Frost is open in the Valley, i just wish they had more locations than just Gilbert. It's a far drive for me, but totally worth it!

5 stars easy, the staff, the gelato all perfection.  We sampled most every flavor, as the owner was excited for us to try each one.  Expensive? Maybe, but I will pay for quality.  Don't miss the SeaSalt Caramel!

Simply the Best!  I must say if you are into Gelato or want to try it even once this place cannot be missed.   The Kiwi is absolutely ridiculously WONDERFUL!  Salted caramel is great too!  the staff is outgoing and it is clean.   The only bummer is that it is so popular the line is out the door and onto the sidewalk most of the time!
The gelato is out of this world, service is top notch, love that you can sample flavors without a cashier rolling their eyes at me... Super friendly staff. Peanut butter crunch is my fave!

I don't get the smug reviews that only give this place 3 stars.  It's not that special? yeah right, this place will knock your socks off.  We recently moved to the valley about 2 years ago, we make sure to take family when they visit, here, and they're all impressed as well.  It is a little pricey but that's what happens when you have exceptional quality.  I like how you can have sample after sample, and the cups of water is a nice touch.

This place was pretty good. They have a good variety of flavors, I like to get their version of strawberry when I go in. Ive only been in a couple times, but its been pretty clean and the staff has been friendly. Sometimes it can get a little busy on the weekends, but thats understandable as its pretty good gelato. Overall its a pretty good place.

Cool blue atmosphere and amazing gelato! The flavors were sooo great and so much variety you can't go wrong! I'll never want anything other than this. I live an hour away and make it a point to come down for a taste, yes it's that good!

I've been here several times lately and find myself liking it more and more.  I wasn't a huge gelato fan (I prefer yogurt or traditional ice cream), but I think I'm a convert.  I like the healthier concept and the flavors and presentation are very gourmet.  One thing that stands out is how incredibly sweet (no pun intended) the employees are here.  It is genuine too, not like a "this is my job so I have to be nice to you" nice, but like a "I really do love working here and I want you to love your experience" kind of nice.  I would give 5-stars but I've yet to find a flavor that I just LOVE (despite sampling almost everything, they love to give you samples!).  I will definitely be back!
The best, authentic gelato ever! This place is amazing! You will not be disappointed with any of the flavors. Salted Caramel is my fav, though. Staff is wonderful!
Friends told me it was healthy, so of course I got the most fattening largest gelato grouping I could get.  It was all delicious!

The head Chef lives in Italy half of the year, and the ice cream tastes healthier and creamier than most artificial places out there. I love the ingredients and the price point is great for the high quality. Love the espresso, a little bitter with the sweet balances it out and provides a great energy boost :)

Be careful, the "diatetic" gelato is full of fructose (which is sugar), even though they claim it's just "natural sugar from the cocoa." Cocoa doesn't have any natural sugar!  Very dangerous and misleading for diabetics  :(
Frost gelato is served too cold and packed too hard to be called a real gelato in Italy, however it is still very enjoyable.  Great friendly service and nice clean décor.

So expensive, but so so yummy. The staff is very friendly and will patiently let you sample  anything you want- and they mean it, unlike some places where if you ask to try more than two you get an exaggerated eye roll.   The dark chocolate- which incidentally is the "healthiest" option as it has no cream or other dairy products- is very rich and indulgent.   I've been to the location in Chandler, but the customer service is much better here so I will continue to make the drive when I get a craving.

I wish they had one closer to Mesa. I love their gelato here. I usually get their hazelnut or their toasted almond, which goes well together. They can get very busy during the weekends, often times the line is out the door but they are very accommodating and provide water and samples for people waiting. The price is on the high side but worth it!

Keeping this one short & simple.  I'm not a huge dessert guy, but they have an excellent variety of flavors, and the service was top notch.  Due to the gelato addiction in our household, we will be back, probably within the week.
Dark Chocolate... oh my! Great friendly service 24/7.  My tip, call your order in advance, to bypass the long wait line. They make it and hold it in the refridg for quick easy pick up.

Whenever I make my way out to Arizona, a stop at Frost Gelato is a must. It has become a staple into the travel itinerary and for good reason.   I discovered Frost a couple of years ago when I was a student out at ASU and was immediately floored. Not only does Frost have some of the most unique flavors, they have the best tasting ones for sure. My go to options are typically strawberry & champagne, sea salt caramel, cheesecake, and/or the limonchello. Equally as impressive as their gelato is the staff. They are always tremendously nice and helpful, especially on days when you just can't decide on what you want. They don't judge you for wanting to try literally everything on the menu and provide useful pairing tips.   I highly recommend Frost to anyone who appreciates quality dessert (especially on a hot AZ day). The unique flavors and great staff make Frost one of the best gelato places in the valley.   TL;DR Pros - Lots of options - Very unique flavors - Super helpful staff  Cons - Not too many locations in PHX area

Delicious gelato but, personally, I think fro-yo is much tastier and CHEAPER. Frost is always packed with people! The serving sizes look mighty small, but turn out to be more than enough! It's a great dessert for a mall day outing.

Expensive for the amount of gelato you get and wasn't that good. Service was good but is was really loud in there which makes it not relaxing. I won't be back I would rather take the drive to Mesa or even Tucson for better gelato with larger portions
Very very good gelato!!!! My favorite place to get something sweet!!!! Workers there are friendly and professional. We go there every time we are at Suntan mall. Please open in more locations.
Fantastic gelato!  If only I could bring it home to Oregon!  Best I've ever had!  Variety of flavors is wonderful and never had a bad experience.

Love this place! Not much to say other than if you're new try and go when it's slow & take advantage of free samples. I'm not a fan of every flavor so if you're like me ordering without sampling could result in a disappointing experience.

The reason that I give this place one star is because, it's not actual "Gelato" it doesn't have the nice smooth texture that Gelato is supposed to. They say that they import their ingredients from Italy, but there is no way, it's just plain ol' ice cream that I could go to coldstone for.. The flavors don't have that wow! factor that gelato should. I have definitely had better!

This is a great place to get delicious gelato! I could eat here everyday! The quality definitely outweighs the price.  I cannot even remember the prices because it was so good that I did not care (it was not expensive though). To be honest, I had never tried gelato before going here, but I know what good ice cream tastes like. They have a huge selection of gelato and all of the flavors taste great. You are allowed to sample everything before making a decision. I have never had a problem with the service, rather everyone has been very nice. The owners are very down to earth and friendly. My overall experience was wonderful. I will definitely come here again when I want amazing gelato. Oh! I suggest salted caramel if you have a hard time deciding.
I really do not understand the hype.   I mean, it is good....not great. Not worth standing in a line stretching down the sidewalk.   A lot of choices, and super friendly.   Just nothing special.

the Gelato is actually pretty good and they let you sample pretty much everything. staff are very nice and really helpful. peak hours have waiting lines out the door and down the sidewalk but it generally moves fast.  I'd say the downsides are that it is way pricey for what you get and the place is usually bursting with hipster-types.

Trip to Santan isn't complete without a stop at Frost.  The staff is always all smiles. With the variety of flavor sand seasonal items it's never boring.  We feel so much better stopping here than for ice cream somewhere else. If you've never tried gelato you need to here.

Damn good gelato.  the best I've ever had and its 1/3rd the fat of normal gelato...don't know how they do it, but it absolutely ROCKS!!!  Love this place and the staff is the absolute BEST and FRIENDLIEST.  the other restaurants nearby should send their wait staff over to Frost for lessons in Customer Service.

Kristen deserves two raises. She was very helpful she showed us amazing combinations and made our day we are going to come see her every night. It's great to see someone so passionate about gelato!!   - Emily

Great place. Lines out the door all of the time. Best time to go is around dinner time.  Great seasonal flavors as well. Never a bad time or a bad flavor. They have won several awards and deserve every single one. Will always come back to this place over and over. Give it a shot.

I was never a fan of gelato until I visited FROST.  I convinced many who thought they had gelato to try this place and they are loyal customers now.   My sister even drives 45 minutes from Phoenix to get some on a regular basis.  I think another Yelper turned me onto this place and they said it was the real deal.  I have not had ice cream since and the flavors are so wonderful.  It is almost like you are eating whatever the flavor is.  Apple pie, roasted almond, caramel, chai tea, tiramisu cappuccino, etc.  It takes you on a journey of flavor that will have you leaving behind anything else you have tried before.  They even have fruit flavored sorbets that are wonderful as well.  I've had the strawberries and champagne, peach, limoncello, and margarita.    On the weekends there is a bit of a line but it goes pretty quickly so do not let that deter you from trying it.  I plan my week around when and what kind of gelato.  Crazy...I know but it is crazy good.
whenever we're over by san tan village, we have to stop by this place.  excellent gelato. very clean place and good services.

Best gelato ever! I have not had a bad flavor yet. I even catered an event with their awesome gelato cart and have been getting compliments for weeks on the tasty treats and phenomenal staff. Thanks FROST!

Screw ice cream, I'm converting to Gelato! Always was a huge fan of gelato but to be honest, I have been disappointed to many times here in the States by little shops trying to get it right. FROST however hit the nail on the head! This place packs a bunch of flavor into one amazing product! All of the flavors I've tried, and believe me there were a lot, where outstanding.  So if your in the area, swing in and try some flavors. Don't be shy, they say you can try all!

What can I say that others haven't.  Great gelato, plain and simple.  Line wasn't too when we went but I've seen it out the door many a time.  Seems to go fast unless you have people in front of you wanting to sample every flavor.

Three weeks later and I'm still dreaming about their gelato.  I ordered their espresso gelato and was not disappointed. With three cases full of gelato, I almost had decision paralysis if not for the friendly staff giving me more than enough samples to try. They even have rotating seasonal flavors, so don't hesitate if you see something you want, because it might not be there!
Amazing gelato! Usually a line out the door at night but go during the middle of the day and you'll walk in and out! A must in Gilbert!

Love this place! Everything is so good, everyone is so friendly, they ask you if you would like a complimentary cup of water and unlimited gelato samples, it's always very clean, and the inside is cute. It's always busy too! I try and make it here at least once a week it's so good!

This place is great. We have tried numerous flavors and everything has been great. The employees are always friendly and helpful. The small cup is one flavor and with the medium cup you can get two flavors. If you haven't been here I highly recommend it.
Little pricey bit amazing flavors made fresh everyday.  I had lemon and raspberry loved it. My daughter hat dark chocolate and oreo, very rich and yummy.  Clean,  great service.
Generous samples. Delicious gelato. Outstanding customer service. Restrooms clean. Two thumbs up!

Seriously the best Gelato I have had ever. I have not been to Italy yet so once I go there this statement will probably be retracted but for now it sticks.  My wife and I tried the Pistachio and Roasted Almond flavors and loved both. The pistachio actually tastes like pistachios (instead of most Gelato places making it taste like almonds). They do have somewhat of a line most of the time but it's tolerable. I would say that the way the counter is setup does not really help customers as it only lets you see the flavors right about when you are expected to choose. I wish the counter setup was different.  Overall if you want delicious Gelato this place is the shop to hit up, just expect a line and some frustrated individuals behind you as they can't see all the gelato they'll have access to.
Everything was great!  Awesome selection including flavors I have only seen in italy.  Quick in/out and seating if you need it.  Plenty of tasting and great location.  A must visit in the desert sun

A great place with great gelato. The staff where very nice and the feel of the place was very welcoming. Meany variety's of flavors even I suggest if your in the area or just walking around the shopping center stop by Frost Gelato Shoppe.
Went on a Saturday night, line was out the door, but it moved fast. Absolutely delicious!! We will be back for sure.

Yes, it really is excellent. This is high-quality gelato!  I went here with a friend who swore up and down that it was fantastic. When we showed up, the line was out the door to the curb, and I was still skeptical. When we got closer and saw all of the flavors, I became hopeful. And when I got my cup and started eating, I was happy. This is really good gelato.  I had the peanut butter crunch and salted caramel. The salted caramel was delicious, but the peanut butter crunch stole the show. This stuff is delicious! My friend had the dark chocolate (and when they say dark, they really mean dark!) and almond. Both of those flavors were delicious as well.  It's a little pricey for the amount, but high-quality gelato usually is.  I look forward to coming back and trying this place again--different flavors, of course.

First time in & I absolutely loved it! The employees were so kind and gladly let me try any flavor I wished! The peanut butter crunch was to die for! The price was so reasonable! I cannot say anything bad about this place, the cherry on top (pun intended) was the service!!! Everyone seemed to genuinely enjoy their job and were happy to serve me. Can't wait to go back!!

The best gelato/dessert in AZ, not too far away from our home. Love the Salted Carmel and the service is great. They are always happy to let our little boy sample ALOT before he decides.....someday...maybe...bubblegum. Haha. We  love it.

Oh wow! Delicious! So good!  Randomly took the kids last night for a treat and apparently we have awesome luck because this is some of the best gelato I've ever I had. I got the caramel macchiato and the kids got strawberry and bubble gum. Flavors are fresh, bold, and well-balanced. They even put a vanilla pirroette on top. So adorable and I just love it when a place pays attention to detail! Then an employee came around with a tray of water. Awesome! Customer service was really great.  The only downside is that the place was so packed (on a Thursday!) that I didn't get to sample anything because I felt so rushed. Maybe I'll come in on a weekday morning so I can take my time sampling! Also, this is a total Mormon hangout. I'm not bothered by that at all but just so people are aware.

Let's talk about Gelato for a moment: sweet, refreshing, delicious. Okay. And let's talk about Frost: sweet, refreshing, delicious, AND THEY CAN MAKE IT INTO A DRINK. I'm totally in.  The staff at Frost are always friendly and are always willing to offer up suggestions about which of the flavors are their favorites. The seasonal gelatos they have are always good and I love trying them all. My favorite will probably always be salted caramel, though. Because if you know me, you know I am a caramel junkie.   In a busy mall, like San Tan, you will find that going here on any night of the week at any time of the year, you will have a line for this sweet, refreshing, post-dinner treat. Well worth it for the awesome staff interaction as well as the gelato itself.

This place is awesome!! I went to Italy and got homemade fresh gelato last summer and this place hits home for me. The best place in Arizona to get gelato as close as the  homeland. There's always a line that goes outside the door so be aware of that but the wait is definitely worth it. I always get the coffee gelato and its simply delicious. Will always go here again and again. They definitely got me to be a regular here!!

So delicious!, so pretty! so fun!   I keep fantasizing that they will open a shop closer to  L A   The gelato is always super fresh 'cause it sells so fast, its all made in-house with primo ingredients. and displayed with Italian flair.   Very friendly vibe as well....all the flavors are delicious ...my faves are: chocolate, coffee, coconut, salted caramel, and the sorbettos .. lemoncello, raspberry, mango...FABULOSO!!!

I added this company as a treat at my daughters wedding, What a great idea! Everyone went crazy over the wonderful gelato. This company was such a pleasure to work with, The staff was so pleasant and accomidating! Thank you so much! YUM
I didn't even know what Gelato was till I tried this place.   Wow, Delicious!

The Gelato here is better than all others I have tried in this area.  Most notably, the texture of their Gelato is perfect, which most other places screw up.  Also, the flavors are full and delicious.   If you go during the day or before 5pm, there is rarely a line. But later in the evening you may end up waiting 20 to 30 minutes.

Ok, I've been back here 3 times since my original review, and I have to revise my original comparison to Italy. I must have been too enamored with Italy the first time around, I really do enjoy this place. I will be going back again!  Oh yeah, I almost forgot.  They let you taste a whole lot of flavors until you decide what you want.

My most favorite dessert place EVER! Love every single flavor I've tried. Pistachio, PB, salted Carmel and so many more. I usually do the smallest cup that you can put two flavors in. My ONLY complaint is that they do not have more stores. This location is always busy on the weekends. Service is always good.
What a great way to cool off after a warm summer day! The line looks long but moves quickly. I loved my Limoncello and Bellini combination.

Oooohhh my goodness!! Where do I even start? The employees were so sweet and patiently let me try allllll the flavors! I ended up with the strawberries and champagne and coconut! I wish this was close to my house! What a sweet treat

We went here after dinner and the smalls were the perfect size.  I had the strawberry champagne gelato and my husband had the cheesecake gelato and we both enjoyed ours.  The line was pretty long but they had enough staff that it moved quickly despite everyone wanting samples.  The only downside is it wasn't too cheap, about $9 for two smalls.  But good for a nice treat!
Wow!! What fabulous flavors. I could see this becoming a constant go-to place since they are always introducing new flavors. Great service and fabulous gelato and sorbet!

Best gelato I've ever had! There isn't a flavor  that I  didn't love and what a selection. The staff and owners are very friendly and always introducing you to new flavors. The espresso and milk shakes are yummy,too.
This is one of the best places I've ever been for anything sweet, my personal favorite is the hazelnut followed closely by the sea salt caramel. I fully recommend this place!
I love the gelato here but I hate the long lines. So if I see the line, I totally pass. But the gelato is super tasty and good. I am always pleased with Frost! Can't go wrong!

I've been coming here at least twice a month for about six months and tried a different gelato each time. None better! Every flavor has satisfied. Still have quite a few to go before I've worked through the menu. By-the-way, the Vanilla is "Indy" approved.  Expect a line and a relatively short wait on weekend evenings. However, the friendly, smiling, staff brings out water to guests that are waiting to place their order.  If you don't want to wait ... use Frost's "concierge" service. The details are on Frost's website. Understand that using the service while standing in line won't cut it. No cutting in line, LOL.

This place is to die for! You can try any flavor - they have soooo many! The staff will take some much time with you even though there's a huge line to make sure you have the best dessert. They are so friendly! The line moves quickly though, I promise! Go and I promise you will be so happy you did! We'll never go to another Gelato place again!

I come here WAY too often. With amazing staples and fun, changing flavors, who could stay away? My phone thinks I work here. It keeps telling me, "15 minutes to work."  They are really patient about people sampling flavors. While you can only get one flavor in the small cup, you can get 2 (1/2 and 1/2) in the medium.  The displays are beautiful! It looks as good as it tastes. And, the restrooms are nice and clean.
Amazing gelato. AMAZING. Just like it tastes in Italy! Rich, creamy, wide flavor variety too...

I originally reviewed Frost's Biltmore location, which I've always spoken very highly of. And this spot, located in San Tan, is deserving of equal amounts of praise.  There's a handful of spots in Phoenix for good gelato. And one would assume that people would dismiss a mini-chain like Frost in favor of a locally owned establishment. But when you take into account their variety of flavors, high quality, and well-trained employees, you really can't help yourself, dammit!  One of the things I've noticed is that Frost employees will consistently provide an "opinion" about every flavor you inquire about. It's almost as if they're all pre-programmed to spout a comment for virtually any kind of flavor you might consider. This is in stark contrast to a place such as Baskin Robbins, for example, where employees are only there to scoop the ice cream. Nothing more and nothing less.  It's also obvious that the employees are well trained in the area of customer service, taking a page out of QuickTrip's playbook. Fake or not, people always respond well to friendliness.  As for flavors, you're bound to find something that works. I've been experimenting with their fruitier flavors recently, but the seasalt caramel or nutella always satisfy a craving for something sweet. My girlfriend is a big fan of their Lotus cookie, which is only available during certain times.   Hell, they even include gelato with booze, including a recent limited edition Cristal, which I deeply regret not trying in order to further enhance my "rags to riches" image. There's also strawberries and champagne, which I'm a big fan of, as well as limoncello, which is allegedly made with four shots of vodka.  What's interesting is that they didn't so much as bat an eye when my 19 year-old sister ordered one, which makes me wonder if you'd have to consume the entire tub in order to get so much as a buzz.  I do prefer the Biltmore location, which isn't quite as congested due to the mall catering to a slightly different demographic. But regardless of where you visit, the gelato is excellent and I seriously doubt you'll be disappointed.  Eventually, when I'm feeling wild and reckless, I'll try one of their drinks to see if they're as good as their gelato.  Great stuff!
YUMMM!!!!  Pistachio & Toasted Almond are awesome !!! Long wait line but it goes pretty fast. Worth the wait.

Freaking amazing!! Salted caramel is the best but I really loved everything I tried. The girls that work there are extremely helpful and friendly. I was so impressed at their customer service. They offered tons of samples and hints and even brought water outside to us. If you ask for the toppings in each carton of gelato, they happily add them to your cup. They truly added an entire chocolate covered banana to my husband's gelato. Love them! So much better than any local fro yo spots.

I must say that I will no longer visit this location for numerous reasons: 1. A blond women on the sales staff ( heavy set in a black polo) rudely interrupted a conversation I was having with a friend while waiting for my gelato, just to ask what my plans were for the day . I was so taken aback, that I had to have her repeat her request. 2. I placed my order with a young helper and even while I was still having a conversation with this employee, she interrupted the employee to ask me what I ate for lunch also this same women in the black polo continued to try to talk me into a larger portion with a different gelato selection. Why can't I just receive what I request. I did not ask for recommendations. 3. I also have a gluten allergy and on a separate occasion a cookie was accidentally placed in my gelato. When I pointed it out, I was asked if it was ok if it was just "scooped" out. The person who asked told me she was a manager and owner.....what customer service from an actual store owner?! Is this how they train their staff.......what if They serve an allergen to a child?

I had a terrible customer experience where one of the girls were very rude. The flavor I got tasted like frozen Sweet'n'low with a touch of mint and i was so unpleased. I asked for a different flavor and she literally rolled her eyes. I wish I had enjoyed my experience there, but i most likely won't be returning.

I love it here. Don't be intimidated by the line, as it moves quickly. It can be difficult to tell all of the flavor options are without getting in everyone else's way but the staff is very patient and you can sample anything. I love the way the staff will bring out water and samples of their other drinks while you enjoy your gelato.

Seriously Delicious.  The line is long, and that is because 1) the gelato is red letter, and 2) the service is above and beyond.  And then there is the price... seriously I am not from Pheonix but where I come from you don't get this quality for such a good price.  I loved this place and am only dissapointed there isn't one in Orange County.    Top Notch!

So good!!! The dark chocolate is a favorite of mine. There's usually a long line but that's because people sample way too many flavors. Went there last week and the girl taking our to go order left our bag with gelato on the back counter behind her to melt. She assumed someone else was going to give it to me. So after a few minutes went by I brought it to the cashiers attention and she apologized profusely. This was probably just a one time incident. We will definitely go back.

This is easily the best gelato place I've been to. They have some great flavors like toasted marshmallow which taste like a marshmallow straight from the camp fire. Also cookie butter and Guinness like the beer and Irish Cream. They taste just like the real thing. It's the most creamy gelato I've had. They let you try any flavor you like. They also have shakes that you can create. Place is always busy and sometimes there is a line but well worth the wait.

I'm search of the best gelato in Phoenix , I was stared to this place by yelpers. The staff was super sweet, guy helping us was chatty and friendly. We had few samples - my favorite were hazelnut & rum raisins. I got the picollo size which is one scoop of hazelnut for $4. While we were enjoying the gelato, the staff came around twice with waters as well.  Happy camper here.

Excellent place to chill and eat something sweet...ice cream haha i mean gelato...four people people working....very efficient...we had three larges i got the sAlted carmel...someone got a shake and one got "Hot Gelatte" piccolo...
Try a lot of samples. The sea salt caramel is their signature flavor and as I'm eating it while writing this I can fully agree.

I'm pretty sure nothing else I could say would be anything no one else has said about this place. Family-owned. Creative, delicious flavors. Fantastic service every time. I see people get intimidated about the line that you find on weekends/evenings but I don't get it. It moves quickly, and they often come around with samples and water. Plus the owners work the line to chat with people.   Why on EARTH would you rather go eat the powdery crap at DQ or that other yogurt place at San Tan?   We've tried the shakes, the frost bites, the coffee blended drinks, and even that fun cone tree you can get ($20, and you get 24 small cones of whatever flavors you want.. so fun for kids and has become our birthday treat tradition). Never once had a flavor or experience that wasn't totally worth it. We find ourselves making excuses to go to the mall just to get gelato.   The fact that it's lighter feeling than ice cream and other gelato places makes it a treat that I don't feel is a huge splurge. Plus they make the flavors using REAL ingredients. No disgusting syrup for the cheesecake, that's real cream cheese. And the crunchy hazelnut chocolate goodness that they put in many of the flavors is to die for. I seriously don't even get the same flavor every time. It's all that good. Even the dietetic flavors (no sugar added but DO NOT contain artificial sweeteners) are always awesome.   If you haven't gone there, get there. You won't regret it.   My faves? Too many to name. Try the whole list.
We brought our 3 year old in after reading Olivia visits Venice. Friendly and delicious!

This place has the BEST gelato I've ever had!! I especially love their Peanut Butter flavor~ I found myself coming here for 4 consecutive days at one point, haha (you can't blame me; it was 115F)! A small is more than enough for me, and it'll run you about $4 for the smallest cup, but it's soooooosoooo worth it!   All the flavors are unique! It's not your typical chocolate flavors or coffee flavors. They have flavors I can't even pronounce! I've tried other flavors and they are equally as amazing in taste and texture! There's one that tastes exactly like Ferrero Rocher's but in gelato form :D YUM. and their salty caramel is amazing as well! Their sorbets are supahhh refreshing, and they bring cups of water to you to quench your thirst! The servers are friendly, and they don't look at you all awful when you want to sample the whole first row before you settle down on a flavor, hehehe.

Obsessed. My boyfriend and I eat here roughly once a month. Not only is everything made with fresh ingredients but they're flown in from Italy. We refuse to eat at any other ice cream/ dessert place because of their wonderful friendliness, unlimited samples and wide progressive menu. My boyfriend always gets fruity flavored and I opt for richer gelato. I've only been disappointed once and that's because I didn't taste their raspberry Chardonnay before I ordered my cup. It was pretty sad hahah but that's not their fault. Anyone who combines gelato and wine is a genius.
This is one of the few places in the States that I can have gelato at without it upsetting my stomach. With ingredients imported from Italy, this is by far the best Gelato I've ever had.

Loved this place! The way they gave individual attention to each of my boys was stellar! When I called saying that I couldn't find it they acted like they missed me the ENTIRE time! The manager is adorable!
It doesn't get any more delicious than Frost! I highly recommend the dark chocolate and sea salt caramel. And it's shockingly low in calories!

I really do like this place. They offer many selections that are all low calorie compared to ice cream. They recently got rid of their Nutella ice cream (I hope they plan to bring it back) which was my favorite, but still many other options to choose from. I really love the Biscotti flavor.

I love this place but the line is always so long no matter when I go! AHHH! But, it does move pretty quickly. Some of the staff is great, others not so much, but I don't really care... I just go for the gelato! :)  Haven't tried the Gelattes yet but I'm sure they are amazing.  **Espresso Chip/Dark Chocolate is my favorite flavor combination.

Sea salt Carmel is amazing!!!  I love this place. The line is always out the door but dont let that turn you away. It is absolutly worth it. The service is always great and they let you test however many you want. Love love love this place!!!

Forget the hype! Again I said forget the hype! This place is good, but if you have it in your head that this place is going to blow your socks off, then you already set yourself up for disappointment.  The wait is worth it.  The gelato here is GOOD! Try all the flavors because they'll let you! Then pick one you want and stick with one scoop. If you get more than one scoop, be prepared to be eating way too much sweet stuff in one sitting. I enjoy the Stracciatella, but they're always selling out of it so you have to get there early to get some of it! Also, get yourself a cup of water! You'll want to cleanse your palate inbetween so you can relive that fresh new flavor with each bite.  Need ice cream? No! Get Frost Gelato!

Best. Gelato. EVER.  Seriously, you will not find a gelato shop better than Frost. It's family owned, and the owners are always at the shop. Everyone is extremely friendly and passionate about their job and their product. The gelato is just absolutely outstanding. The flavors are unique and everything is very fresh. The owner mentioned to me that each flavor is less than 24 hours old. That's amazing!  Frost also does a gelato cart for your special events. I'm dying to have them at my wedding reception!  Thank you for the delicious gelato and top notch customer service!

Meh. What's all the hype about? Sure it was delicious but at what cost? Personally I think you can get a lot more for your money at the self serve places. There are lots of flavors to choose from. The staff was friendly. Also, what's up with all the flies. I literally saw 10 flies all over the walls. I don't know if it was just this particular night or what but it was weird. I've never seen something like that before. The gelato/ice cream was good but for the other reasons listed I won't go back.
This is very close to the Scottsdale civic center. My boyfriend and I enjoyed the sea salted Carmel while waiting for his concert to start. Yummy!

Took my daughter here for a quick treat, I got pistachio and she got bubblegum in a waffle cone. Both were great, but after a few bites Hailee decided she wanted something else. We went back through the line to get something else, and although I offered to pay for a second cone the person helping us (maybe the owner) insisted that it was on the house. Great gelato and excellent customer service, highly recommend this place!

My husband is an ice  ream fanatic but tonight I wanted something a little different.  Wow! What a nice surprise.  The service was great - the girls behind the  counter were more than helpful suggesting ftheir favs and popular choices while handing out samples of whatever you wanted to try.  We both got the medium which had two flavors. My choices were tiramisu and pistachio.  They were both great but the pistachio was by far my favorite.  My husband got bellini and black cherry.  Again both were great as well but he felt the black cherry could have had more cherries.  Overall however it was a nice experience.  In fact, a nice touch was they brought around a tray of cups of water to pass out to customers.  Something so small makes a huge difference. We will definitely be back again to try more flavors.

I grew up in SF having "authentic" gelato in North Beach (Italian town); but this is by far the best gelato I've tasted.  The smell of fresh made waffle cone fills the store.  To top it off they have a wide selection and friendly staff.  There's always two or more low sugar flavors to choose from and up to 31 other flavors.  Shop is also clean and nicely decorated.  Wish they would open up one in SF Bay Area.  The only downside is that there always seem to be a line in the summer.  It's worth the wait.

Love this place!!!! The owners are absolutely wonderful, very friendly and love what they do! Every time we come here there is a line out the door, but it's worth the wait and they work very fast to make sure the line is constantly moving! There are a ton of different flavors to choose from..... you cant come here and not find anything you don't like! There is something for everyone!  Absolutely recommend the Sea Salt Carmel...... never tasted another flavor of gelato better than this!  Keep it up Frost!

We've been to this location three times and have always had a positive experience.  The staff is very friendly, knowledgeable, and patient.  The gelato is awesome and the place has always been clean, which I particularly appreciate.  I also appreciate that they allow you to sample as many flavors as necessary to help you make your decision.

I took my family here while they were visiting after having them over for dinner! They absolutely loved it. They thought I was insane when they saw the line but it moves fast and Is definitely worth the wait! You can try as many as you'd like and everyone is super nice!

We have been there twice and tried different flavors. First was vanilla bean and the second was Bellini. Both were refreshing and not too sweet which I like. Our little one enjoyed his gummy flavored gelato. My husband's black cherry was also delicious. The nice touch was to have a glass of water served with the gelato.

A scoop of heaven or in my case three.  The owner let me try sample after sample until I settled on pineapple sorbet and coconut gelato.  Delicious doesn't convey how good it was.  The fact that it was also low fat and healthier than ice cream didn't even factor in the equation.  Lastly the staff were friendly and knowledgeable, we look forward to returning soon.
I would give this place 5 plus stars! We love this place, and want them in California! The service was great and the gelato is beautifully presented.
Love this place! I love how they don't mind if you ask for more than 2 or 3 samples because they know how to appreciate customer.
I have never had a bad experience here staff is always friendly and the gelato is always great. My recommendation is to get the pistachio it's mine and my wife's favorite!

Absolutely wonderful! The flavors are intense and rewarding the staff is patient an fast moving. The only negative is that so many people love this place, making for a long line any time of day .It is worth the wait!

"Rated best dessert in Arizona". And yep they do not lie.  Don't even waste your time at any other Gelato spots as Frost is in a league of there own. Every flavor no matter which you choose is outstanding.   My favorite is the Salted Carmel.  If you have a sweet tooth this is definitely the spot to ca that craving.

I almost don't want to write a good review because it will contribute to the longer lines! I had heard about this place through the grapevine. My husband and I wanted to make a quick stop specifically for gelato. We drove past Frost and the line was out the door and almost to the corner! I mean I'm sure at least a 45 minute wait. I'm pretty impatient so my feelings were crushed that we weren't going to have gelato. My husband and I happened to be in the area the next day and so we thought we would drive by and see what the wait was like. The line was not nearly as bad so we decided to take a chance...I was excited to see the different flavor options. The staff was friendly as we were sampling a few because it was hard to decide. I had decided on the marshmallow flavor and it was sooo yummy! (I'm craving it now!) I can see now why there was a crazy long line for this amazing gelato! I recently moved here from chicago and miss my favorite gelato spot. I've also been to Italy and have had the real deal...so I'm a bit picky. I'm very excited to find Frost and can't wait to introduce this wonderful place to my friends and family when they visit us!

Wow! Now I understand the 5 star rating! This place is fantastic! It's was girl's night, so my bestie and I came here for a sweet treat after eating a yummy dinner at Costa Vida. The line really wasn't long when we entered the shoppe but there were tons of people outside and inside enjoying their cold gelatos during this blistering Arizona heat wave. We were greeted by smiling faces who offered us samples; the gelato was so airy! I opted for the mint chocolate chip and my friend had the cheesecake. We paid, we picked a table, and then we were in gelato heaven. I've had gelato at other places but theirs is at an entirely different level. It's extremely light in your mouth, and so airy and creamy. Another plus is they have a staff member walking around offering cold water to guests. I love this! Other ice cream, yogurt, and gelato shops purposely only have bottled water so you have to purchase it. Frost seems to focus more on their service, your experience, and their wonderful gelato. It's funny, because when other Yelpers mention you will never want ice cream again, it's true!!

I must say, this place is delicious! It is always clean and the staff is always friendly. I really like that they go above and beyond with the case display! They also give you a small free gelato on your birthday which is very generous and appreciated. I don't go as often as I would like because the line is always out the door when I'm in the vicinity. Keep up the good work!
LOVE this place. I always get the sea salt caramel, but the dark chocolate is good if you want a really rich flavor. They give you a free small one on THE DAY of your birthday if you show ID :D
This place is great! I really appreciate the extreme friendliness and kindness of the employees. Best customer service. Also, the variety of favors is fantastic!

What a fantastic end tons wonderful day! We haven't had gelato as tasty as this since leaving Italy. We should have known by the length of the line stretching out the door and along the sidewalk! Fortunately for us, the staff quickly served up those in line in front of us - and what looked like it could've been a 30-min wait was less than 10! Great, friendly service, and incredible gelato! Can't wait for a Frost Gelato to open up close to home for us!

Frost was great. I like good customer service and they were very patient. Frost makes you feel like you are fancy and healthy with all the gelato propaganda.   There is always a line- even on a cold night. There are alot of flavors but you can try as many as you like. The hazelnut choco is very much like nutella. The fruit flavors are sweet and fresh. I also like that they give everyone a cookie in the icecream.   I would come here again. I can see why its popular.

I have been a regular at Frost now for over a year. The quality is consistently perfect. The service is always fast and friendly even when there is a line out the door in the middle of 100 degrees. They always bring around water to everyone sitting and keep the tables clean as soon as someone gets up. They have seasonal flavors that are always fun to try as well as sorbets. My favorite is cheesecake with blackberry. Always really good. I also highly recommend the sea salt caramel, peach, and raspberry.   It is very hard to go to San Tan Village and not stop here so I do all the time! Best gelato place in AZ.

If you have to ask how I liked my visit to Frost was then you clearly haven't been there. Even when there is a line it's no big deal... they hand out samples and cups of water and most people are polite and the line moves quickly. The gelato is amazing presentation and taste. Great setting too. Why are you still reading this.....GO.

Wide variety of flavors from super sweet to decadent to fruity. Great value - great taste. The GOOGLE MAP attached to the addressed is hosed. The Frost Gelato Shoppe is actually in San Tan Village mall next to  Brio Tuscan Grille

Fave gelato spot! Awesome variety of flavors, unlimited samples,nice workers, and solid location. The seating is limited but there are both indoor and outdoor options. It's located right in San Tan Mall so there's parking available too.  After a long tiring day of shopping, cool down with this treat!

Came here on a sunny day.. in need of a cool down.  Though I'm not a big fan of ice cream I asked my boyfriends opinion for this review.  The workers were super friendly and we got to try a couple of flavors.  The salted caramel was said to be their most popular.. it was yummmm but might be a little overwhelming if I got an entire cup.  My boyfriend ended up getting the strawberry sherbet because it was a healthier alternative, fat free + milk free.  It was good to me the first few bites but then it just got really sweet, he felt the same way.  I wouldn't go out of my way to come to this place but I would stop by if I was shopping around in Santan

First time in was last night. Surprisingly busy for@ 9:30 PM. Excellent, delicious gelato! Toasted marshmallow taste exactly like the campfire treat. Little rich for my liking, but really good. The Peach & Strawberry Champagne Sorbets were outstanding!! Perfect cool feel on the palate for any occasion & a great indulgence during those hot summer months too! Tried the Frost Bite ( ice creamed filled chocolate covered candy) peanut butter crunch. It was yummy! Staff was pleasant. Can't wait to try more flavors of what they offer. We will be back "for sure"
I really enjoyed the gelato here.  They have a variety of flavors and the customer service is great.  This place gets pretty busy so be prepared for that.

definitely some good eats . Looking for that special ice cream style treat Gelato it is . This place is very clean organized with some great service. Free samples as much as you want to try and im telling you its amazing the flavors... Everyone that went that day all enjoyed it the Salt Carmel , Toasted almond thw in house made waffle cones it all comes thru in the flavor and experience. when people give a 5 they definitely earned it and I don't give 5 that often .. try it at least once to know what everyone is saying .. We have been back !

My quick summary:  Ice cream will never satisfy you again.  That's right.  Never.  I'm sorry to say that for most of my life I had bad taste, and didn't even know it.  I loved ice cream growing up.  Who didn't?  Well, after discovering Frost, I can't eat ice cream anymore.  Gelato has only been in my life a few years.  But now I know what I've been missing out on.  If you've never tried gelato, there are some major differences you need to be aware of.  First, ice cream is packed with air, so it's not as great a flavor compared to gelato.  Second, gelato is MUCH MUCH MUCH MUCH MUCH (like whole freaking bunches) creamier.  And third, it has way less calories and fat.    Frost is a truly unique experience.  The creators tried to be authentic as possible.  The majority of their ingredients and all of their equipment is imported from Italy.  Their master gelato chef?  He's from Italy too.  And you can tell.  The flavors are amazing.  They even have an extensive sorbet collection.  When you first walk in you're greeted by a display with dozens of flavors, all masterfully decorated to look like works of art (candied sugar, champagne corks and flavorful swirls, oh my).  A couple flavors even change monthly, to go with the season.  Oh peppermint, how I miss you.  I ended up taking like a gallon of that stuff home to gorge myself upon...  But that's another story.  The staff are extremely friendly and polite.  There will wait upon you while you sample flavor after flavor until you find the perfect one to purchase.  Their best selling flavor is sea salt caramel.  And you can pair it with almost any other flavor to make your second choice even better.  And if you're not a straight gelato fan & want to get ll kinds of inventive treats, they accommodate those wishes as well.  You can get a milk shake, gelato infused coffee beverage, etc.  And their milkshakes are insanely good.  My fiance & I like to share a large one (more flavor combos available).  The best thing we've ever had there is a banana, chocolate, peanut butter crunch and seas salt caramel shake.  They even sell gelato cakes and other yummy treats for special occasions.  So if you're looking for a truly life altering dessert or sweet snack...  Go to Frost.  They will not disappoint.

I really enjoy this place. The people are friendly. And they have a rotation of flavors each month! They also seem to have different flavors depending on the weeks. That said I'm sad when they tease me with a flavor I enjoy only to come back and not find it again. But that's ok because they have tons of other delicious flavors to try!

Been trying to get in this place for years but the line literally wraps around the buildings.  Finally got in and I now understand why the lines are so long.  The lemon gelato has just the right amount of tartness and a balanced texture that borders on the smoothness and flavors of European Ice Creams.  The strawberry has the right amount of sweetness and the same smooth, creamy texture.  I even saw other flavors I am interested in trying such as the salted caramel.  However, the customer service provided at Frost will definitely ensure that people like me will return.  If I say I am going to look for a specific person to help me with anything, that means his/her service was THAT good.
Great gelato and lots of flavors.  A perfect way to wrap up an evening at SanTan Village. Don't let the line out the door turn you away.  It's worth it and the service is excellent.

Went in for a little gelato with a friend of mine and I was not disappointed! Frost has a very family friendly environment. Apparently it's a lovely place to take the kids. I saw at least 5 strollers while there. I was very satisfied with the wide selection of frosty treats. I opted for an old favorite: pistachio! Having lived in Italy for two years, I know a bit about gelato, and in my opinion this is the best gelato to be found in town. The staff is very friendly and helpful as well. Bravo!

I am so lucky to live close to Frost. Everything I've ordered there is delicious. My son loves the sea salt caramel, which is their most popular flavor. I get a different flavor every time I go in. This is so far beyond a typical ice cream scoop shop. I like getting an affogato (espresso poured over gelato) or sorbettini (fruit sorbet blended with Pellegrino).

ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! I have never had Gelato with as much flavor as any of the options that they serve at Frost. The staff seems cheerful and extremely helpful every single time I have gone in with recommendations and knowledge of all of their flavors, which is abundant. I usually stick with the salted caramel but with unlimited taste testing I have a hard time picking which one I want because they are all insanely delicious.   The line wraps around the block but moves quickly and is worth the wait for the crazy delicious Gelato goodness that is inside.

Love the convenience! Love the service! They come around with samples and bring you water. Everyone is so friendly too! They have a nice variety of flavors that continually change. Their hours are perfect too as there is not much (nothing actually) to do in Gilbert at 10pm.
This place is wonderful!! From the enthusiastic and helpful staff to the wide array of delicious gelato flavors, Frost is always a welcomed treat.

A definite fan! I love the samples! Pinapple, mango, and mint & chip are my faves! The atmosphere is nice and they're open to giving many samples! It's a great sweet treat for the weekend!! I saw a sign that they were best gelato in the Phoenix area for this year ~ The place is clean and delicious! =]

So happy Frost Gelato came to  the San Tan shopping center in Gilbert.  There are many flavors all arranged in a glass enclosure for easy selection.  My favorites are the marbled black cherry, banana, strawberry and salted caramel, but all are excellent.  They allow you to select three flavors in the large cup, so you can easily pick three and narrow down your favorites. Although, it seems to always have a line....the wait is worth it.

Yeah, I know where I'll be hanging out when I'm back in Gilbert and bored to tears. This gelato place is my jam. I just had lunch but was craving something sweet again*. It was 57 degrees which meant it's cold to the locals so I thought this place would not be busy. Boy, was I wrong. The place was packed INSIDE but luckily no wait.   The young woman who greeted me gave me the rundown of the place: gelato and sorbet flavors as well their drink menu.They had a lot of options and was a little overwhelmed. I tried a few gelato samples - peanut butter, pumpkin, and mint chocolate chip. I already knew I would get the mint chocolate chip before I walked in, but you know, I just wanted some options. Since everyone thought it was "too cold" to eat gelato outside, all the outdoor tables and chairs were empty. Uh, it was such a nice sunny day out so why not sit outside. I wasn't the only one with the same idea. A woman and her dog (who didn't go inside) sat out there too. I loved my gelato but probably not as much as the dog. He devoured his own scoop much to my amusement.   *I filled my sweet cravings with gelato and a cupcake from Caketini (http://www.yelp.com/biz/caketini-gilbert#hrid:W-hsyk_4inhaeT6YtJcBhQ), also in the same mall. I am not ashamed.

The people at Frost may not tell you, but Angels make the gelato. What you are actually eating is Heaven. If you listen closely once you have finished eating there is a holy choir singing. It's true. I heard it once myself.   Worth the hype, the price and the wait. Expect to wait 20-30 minutes in the late afternoon. The staff try their best to give quality service with such long lines. Just be patient and you won't be let down.

Wonderful! I'm not from Phoenix so when myself and two friends walked into Frost out of curiosity, we had an employee of the name Nicole come right up and welcome us. Well we were just looking at what was there, and she grabbed some sample spoons and had us taste the salted caramel. DELICIOUS! She gave me recommendations to what would go good with what, she had conversations with us. She was just wonderful! The gelato was wonderful! She knew all this information on the company.  And she was quick. Amazing service! We spoke to the manager that was there and even she was great. The other lady (I didn't catch her name) I was watching her with the other customers and she was as well. I love this place and wish I lived near by. OR that there was another one in LA. LOVE IT!
Amazing gelato!  I always get the dark chocolate and almond.  The service is wonderful and the staff is always super friendly.

This place has the best gelato I've had! It's also clean and has crisp wintery decor. Every flavor I've tried (unlimited samples!) has made it all the more difficult to decide what I want versus thinking what I thought I wanted before walking in. The staff is super friendly and knowledgable about the ingredients that go into the massive variety of gelato they serve. Each flavor has a custom carved fruit or whatever the main ingredient is as decor on top of the batch. I would recommend this place during hot or cold weather because you never know when you're experiencing a sweet and decadent craving! They also make milkshakes with your choice of gelato, smoothies, affogato, and fat-free sorbet (strawberries & champagne and blackberry cabernet are delicious). You can get a single or double scoop and they even have your everyday option to get a pint or bigger. Individual servings are topped with a mini pirouette which is a nice touch :)
Best gelato spot in Gilbert!  I love how friendly the staff is and how cute the shop is as well!

Wow. Wow. Wow. OMG!! LOVE this place. We went back home for a visit and my BF and I started at a sushi shop then Frost for dessert. First of all it's ver reasonably price for this high-quality daily made fresh gelato and sorbet. I'm so used to paying for frozen yogurt stores in San Diego which end up costing 7 to 9 dollars or more depending on your toppings. The small cups at this gelato place are four dollars and the medium cups are five dollars. They have some that are your typical traditional flavors they also have very unique combinations and some with alcohol wine or liquors in them. If you're ever in the San Tan Mall area take a quick break and treat yourself to a heavenly treat.
The best gelato shop Ive ever been to. I dont want to eat at any other place ever again. Im trying to convince them to build one in my garage.

Friendly staff. Like REALLY friendly. So good. After gelato 62 closed down, I was really sad but I found this place.  One down side is that it's really hard to find unless you happen to be wandering around the area. Probably google maps fault but it took me almost a half hour to find the place.

My favorite Gelato place, yet!  I just want all the flavors.. But my favorites are the Salted Carmel topped with a sorbet. We usually go with the lemon, mango, or strawberry.   They have the Kiwi gelato over the summer, that one is my #1 favorite! It tastes like 10 kiwis in one...  It gets pretty busy here, every time we go the line is coming out of the building.

Now I understand the hype and all the amazing reviews. Excellent gelato! My favorite is the espresso. My kids love the bumble gum flavor. I also like the regular chocolate. I tried the salted caramel but it was a little Too sweet for me but still Very delicious.

This is the most amazing gelato place. The staff is so patient and energetic which makes the experience even more delightful. I tried it the first time two weeks ago and since have been in three times! The Andes mint and dark chocolate are my favorite however strawberry is high on my list as well. It's definitely worth the wait!

new gelato spot in san tan village! i did enjoy my gelato last wednesday night. It was creamy yet light.  we ordered small cups-for me sea salt caramel and the mint and chip for mr h. the gelato was good, the unique flavors were great but the price? $8 (7.93) a tad pricey for tiny cups.  it's an OK price for a couple but I imagine for a family it could get expensive.  anyways i enjoyed my treat and it's a cool little shoppe.

The gelato was really good I had gotten coconut the only thing I didn't like was the customer service the employees weren't really that friendly nor enthusiastic and there was hardly anywhere to sit which was kind of a bummer but other than that it was a good experience I probably won't go back but if the customer service was great I would of left a tip so step your game up
Best gelato I've ever had! I could eat frost every day yummy. Peanut butter crunch gotta try. Great job frost :)

This place is absolutely amazing. I first went there with my mom to order a birthday cake for my sister. There was nobody in the store and the owner was there and she literally let us sample as many gelato flavors that we pleased before we made our decision. They have the coolest cakes. They are so unique. I ended up going back a week later and getting a cake for my son's 13th birthday. It was perfect for him. They decorated the top with candies and cookies. Everyone loved it. This place is top notch. The gelato is amazing the way they decorate all of the different flavors is beautiful this places over the top

My daughter and I just went to FROST Gelato in the San Tan Village in Gilbert.(between Brio & Cantina Laredo on Painted Sky Drive)   If you like Gelato, you will LOVE this Gelato!  If you have never tried it, get ready to be addicted because this is at the top of the best Gelato I have ever tasted!  There are so many positives for this business:  the shop is beautiful; it looks more like a nice restaurant than a place to buy Gelato.  The staff is dressed in white and welcomes you when you enter.  The Gelato Case is filled with a vibrant, enticing assortment of flavors.  The staff was encouraging letting you sample before deciding, and I had to have the Sea Salt Caramel.  I rarely eat anything Caramel, but this is an outstanding flavor!  What I sampled was also amazing! My daughter chose coconut and loved hers.  Here is the best part:  I picked up a brochure and already knew Gelato is a healthier dessert than many other choices, but learned that Gelato is only 3-8% butterfat compared to ice cream which contains 12-25% butterfat.  Thankfully, there is no sacrifice in the taste!  I also looked in their dessert case which featured delectable looking treats!  We are looking for ward to going back...also good to note is that they are open Sun -Thurs 11am-10PM and Fri and Sat 11am until 11pm!  They provide inside and outside seating.  In the summer months it is great to have the option to go over at night and be able to sit outside enjoying something this refreshing.   We moved to Gilbert from upstate NY, for us this will be a fun place to visit again and again!  I would say...hurry up and try it!  I would select more than five stars for this if I could.

Frost is a great gelato shop that has a lot of unique and interesting flavors.  Sometimes, it's hard to pick just one or two, but I usually make up my mind pretty quickly.  Their best selling flavor is Seasalt Caramel and I have to admit it is one of my go-to flavors when I'm having a tough time deciding.  One of my personal favorites is their Dark Chocolate.  It's pretty thick and is almost like eating a cold brownie, but I think it's delicious and get it almost every time we go.  One of my only complaints about Frost is, as soon as you go through the line and get up to the counter, the employees ask what they can get for you right away without giving you a chance to look in the case to see what flavors they have.  I know that theer is a menu on the wall, but they do have seasonal flavors that are not listed on the menu and I usually need a few moments to browse the case to see what strikes me that day.  The other thing about their menu is that it is not always accurate.  As I write this review, I am looking at their menu online and see that they have Butter Pecan listed as a flavor but on one visit when I tried to order Butter Pecan they told me it was a seasonal flavor and they did not have it available.  This can be concerning since I cannot trust that the flavors on the menu are the flavors in the case.  They only have four indoor tables and during the busy times this are usually packed but there are a few tables outside and while it's not 117 degrees out, they are a nice place to sit.  Frost also has some great no-sugar added flavors which is nice.  I usually end up going to Frost with my wife and 18 month old so (who loves bananas) so its nice to be able to get him a no-sugar added banana gelato and not feel like I'm filling him up with terrible things that he shouldn't be eating.  Overall, Frost is a great place and we love going there.  When you go, tell the staff that you need a minute to look at the falvors they have and they will give you the time you need.  Frost is also open later than most of the other stores in the San Tan mall (10pm during the week and 11pm on the weekends), so it's nice to have a late-night place to hit before the day is done.
This gelato is amazing!  My fiance has a dairy allergy, and all of the dairy free sorbets are so rich and delicious!  I highly recommend the blackberry cabernet and limoncello!
So perfect for being a lactose intolerant! Best stuff on Earth! Awesome and very friendly staff!

We tried this place today after looking at all the raving reviews from Yelp. It was a big disappointment for me taste-wise. Service was fast and there are many varieties but the most important is taste!  I tasted sea salt caramel, mango and roasted almond, all turned out not so great. I just cannot understand how it tastes so good to all others 0_0. My boyfriend didn't like it either. We both couldn't finish our small cups. O wells .

I love this place. After I went here, I can't eat ice cream  anymore because compared to Gelato it tastes like crap. Also, Gelato is much better for you than ice cream.  The employees here are always friendly and I have been here a lot. I recommend ordering the smallest size of Gelato because it is much more concentrated and denser than ice cream.
I am in love with this place!!!! Sea salt caramel is to die for :).. my boyfriend bought me a gelato cake from here for my birthday and it was seriously so beautiful! i cant get over this place

The very best of the best right here, staff is electric, friendly and very personable. Gelato is amazing and soooooo much to choose from, place is clean and the decor is very interesting...in a good way!!! Love this place!!!!!
Love to stop by for a taste of Heaven!  It is worth the parallel parking on some occasion!  Ha ha

Frost Gelato doesn't need my review because EVERYONE seems to love this place, including me.  I'm a sucker for good gelato and Frost has the best.  Great atmosphere and even worth standing in line (which is common but the line moves fast).  The staff is friendly and you can't beat the location (across the street from the Apple store).  My favorite is the Sea Salt Caramel which the staff says is their #1 seller. Around Christmas they also have Peppermint which shouldn't be legal because it's so delicious.  I once tried the hot chocolate...wow!  It tastes like a hot melted version of the chocolate gelato and warmed me right up the night I had it.  Keep up the great work Frost!  You deserve the praise.
Once again Frost lives up to their standards.  Focused on the customer and a high quality product!

Very good gelato, but they need to manage and control the line better.  People will sample 10+ flavors, and crowd the small case, which makes it impossible for anyone else to pick a flavor.  The flavor selection is good, but comparable to other gelato shops.

We loved everything about Frost! The service was great and the Gelato speaks for itself, absolutely delicious! We especially loved that everything was made fresh on site and does not contain preservatives.  Friendly staff and a clean store. Definitely a place we plan to visit more often.
Best gelato you can find anywhere and price is reasonable for the size. In the little cup... They pack so much ice cream in there!!! Any other gelato places don't compare. love love love!
We love Frost! It's always worth the wait for the gelato! There's also consistent friendly and fast service!
So many great flavors to choose from, and such fantastic service.  The salted caramel and peanut butter crunch were my favorites, but equally as delicious was the Irish Cream!  I'll be back for sure!

Kristen is wonderful! She was beyond helpful and friendly! We were so lucky to visit one day with no lines and have a little one on one time with her! We learned a lot about the amazing gelato.   Just remember the line may look long sometimes but they are super quick! Get in line enjoy the samples and water they bring out while your waiting!

This place is so good and surprisingly inexpensive! Best gelato ever! I recommend the strawberry champagne. Nice to come for a little dessert with friends. The workers are really nice and it is a clean place. It gets pretty busy but they are quick. Also don't feel bad for sampling the different flavors, there are so many and you will want to make sure you have the perfect flavor.

YES! Yum. After a friend recommended Frost, I was slow in trying it because it's pretty far from where I live. I was in the area recently so I figured I should stop in because I wasn't sure when I'd be nearby again. So glad I made some extra time.  It's located in a shopping complex behind an Italian restaurant. There's a lot of parking on the street but it's probably pretty full on weekends.  The shop is big, modern, and the staff are really nice and friendly. The case of gelato is huge, and I had to walk back and forth a few times.
